About the job
            
 
Roles & ResponsibilitiesYou will be working on client projects which can involve different areas of Business Transformation (BT) competences depending on the client’s main business challenges. These can range from business transformations, streamlining of operating processes, cost optimizations, digitalization, new technologies, improving customer experience, organizational changes, etc.Business Transformation (BT) competences include mainly (but are not limited to): Business strategyOrganization design and target operating modelOperational Excellence, specifically process design & optimizationPeople & Change, ensuring cultural and behavioral change and embedding change within organizations as well as optimizing the HR function and the human capital via future-proof talent management strategies and processes;Customer, Sales, Marketing and Services advisory, including value proposition definition, customer journey mapping and analysis, customer process improvements and transformationProject and portfolio management
You will thus be an active participant of the long-term goal of Business Tranformation (BT) by assisting clients in their business challenges and by bringing sustainable added value to the company as a whole. In addition to your role within project teams, you will also be involved in supporting business development activities such as proposal writing for new client demands.Your role will be highly varied and involves working in a supportive, young and dynamic team. The range of clients, and the projects you could work on, offers continuous challenge and a constantly shifting workload.You'll be in regular contact with clients, requiring travel many client sites on a national and international basis.Skills & QualificationsWe are looking for people who will soon hold a master degree in Economics (applied economics, business administration...), Commercial/Civil Engineering, Psychology, Social Sciences, Law... or an equivalent.Besides a strong technical basis, we are looking for people who: Have a working knowledge of French or Dutch (mother tongue/bilingual) and English;Like to work in a project based working environment;Take responsibility to deliver high-quality service;Foster innovation;Build collaborative relationships;Seek feedback and motivate others;Create an environment in which all team members feel like they belong;Communicate transparently and with impact;Are proactive and can demonstrate a “can-do” attitude;Are constructive and solution oriented;Have an analytical mindset;Can demonstrate integrity by being reliable and dependable;Can work independently and in a team;Are flexible and can adapt their organization (remote work, one-site…) according to circumstances and needs (client needs…).
We offerAt KPMG, we commit ourselves to encouraging true team spirit and creating an international and dynamic working environment in which each can pursue the knowledge needed to boost their career. Additionally, we highly invest in our people’s development of soft skills and technical knowhow.We also offer: An inclusive workspace that encourages diversity and pursues mutual respect and tolerance for each other’s beliefs and background.A competitive and attractive compensation package with extra legal advantages (mobility budget or lease car, laptop, IPhone/IPad device, insurance package…)A flexible, hybrid working schedule where employees can work on different locations: at home, at the office, on the go or at a client’s site.A wide range of teambuilding activities and social events (e.g. afterwork drinks, network evenings, annual national receptions, etc.) that enable new joiners to meet colleagues within the wider KPMG community and have some fun along the way.A comprehensive well-being programme that includes hospitalization insurance and several initiatives that focus on mental health.

About the job
            
 
Do you agree that today's social and environmental challenges can only be met through the smart use of digital technologies? Are you ready for this future and are you looking for an innovative, agile working environment in the e-commerce sector where you can have an impact on champions and hidden champions? Then you have come to the right place! Become a pioneer of digital transformation and support our team!What you can expect You, embedded in our project teams, will be responsible for supporting the managers of well-known customers from a wide range of industries in the digitization of their core business.You will take on responsibility for (sub-)projects, specialist topics and people, depending on your experience.You will transfer current technology trends into new business ideas and derive sustainable business models and strategies.Through customer, competition and best-practice analyses, you will create a solid basis for decision-making and you will integrate knowledge and experience carriers on the customer side in innovative workshop formats into the design of results.
This is what you bring along An above-average master degree, ideally with a focus on Business, Engineering or IT.[Mandatory requirement] Relevant professional experience of at least two years in Strategy Consulting in an established management consultancy.Solid experience and enthusiasm in several of the following topics: Digital Business Models, Corporate Strategy, Change Management, Transformation Management.Strong analytical skills, structured thinking and result orientation as well as initial leadership experience and convincing presentation skills.Excellent communication skills in English (C1-level). German and Portuguese are a strong advantage.

About the job
            
 
ZS ist eine Unternehmens- und Technologieberatung, die sich auf die Transformation des globalen und lokalen Gesundheitswesen spezialisiert hat. Dabei verstehen wir unsere Mitarbeitenden als unsere wertvollste Resource. Du arbeitest Seite an Seite mit einem leistungsstarken Team, um Lösungsansätze von Anfang bis Ende mitzugestalten. Dabei gehen wir andere und innovative Wege, um die vielseitigen Herausforderungen unserer Kunden im Gesundheitsmarkt effektiv und langfristig zu lösen. Dabei definierst Du Deinen eigenen Weg und wirst innovative Ideen und Projekte aktiv mitgestalten. Gemeinsam mit unseren Kunden entwicklst Du im Team wirksame Lösungen und schaffst Mehrwert für Unternehmen, deren Kunden und Patienten. Unsere Teams unterstützen Kunden in den Bereichen Portfoliostrategie, Vertriebsstrategie, Marktforschung, Forschung und Entwicklung, betriebliche und technologische Transformation, Marketingstrategie und vieles mehr.STRATEGY INSIGHTS & PLANNING CONSULTANTAls Strategy Insights & Planning Consultant (SIPC) leitest du Projektteams um unseren Kunden hochwertige Lösungen zu liefern. Dabei nutzt du fortschrittliche Datenanalysen- und Problemlösungstechniken sowie ausgeprägte Synthese- und Kommunikationsfähigkeiten. Insbesondere steuerst du als SIPC Projektpläne und erabeitest gemeinsam mit deinem Team Frameworks um Lösungen für die vielseitigen Herausforderungen unserer Kunden zu entwickeln.Desweiteren unterstützt du Veränderungsprozesse und setzt standardisierte analytische Techniken ein, um Kundenentscheidungen zu erleichtern. Nach Bedarf arbeitest du an mehreren Projekten gleichzeitig. Während deiner beruflichen Weiterentwicklung hast du die Möglichkeit, dich auf eine bestimmte Industrie, einen Unternehmensbereich und/ oder auf Kundenbeziehungen zu spezialisieren.Für unser Büro in Frankfurt am Main oder Berlin suchen wir ab 2024 mehrere Strategy Insights & Planning Consultants (m/w/d).Deine Aufgaben: Gemeinsam mit der Projektleitung definierst Du den Projektumfang und entwickelst die Vorgehensweise; Du leitest die Projektausführung in dem du Fortschritte festhältst, Projektdaten organisierst und Teammeetings koordinierstDu entwirfst Analysen und stellst Hypothesen zur Lösung von Kundenproblemen aufDu entwickelst qualitative und quantitative Analysen zum Testen und Analysieren der HypothesenDu fasst die Ergebnisse zusammen und kommunizierst diese an Kunden und ZS-TeamsDu koordinierst und betreust Kundenprojektteams um sicher zu gehen, dass die Bedürfnisse unserer Kunden adressiert werdenDu baust Kundenbeziehungen auf, die über die Projektausführung hinaus gehen. Dies fördert Diskussionen sowie ein harmonisches Kundenverhältnis mit neuen Perspektiven Du unterstützt Aktivitäten im Bereich Business DevelopmentDu wirkst bei internen Firmenaktivitäten mitDu fungierst als Coach und Mentor für unsere junior Teammitglieder
Dein Profil: Abgeschlossenes Studium der Wirtschaftswissenschaften, Marketing, Psychologie, Naturwissenschaften, Ingenieurswesen, Angewandte Mathematik, Statistik (Bachelor, Master, PhD oder MBA) oder einer vergleichbaren Studienrichtung5 bis 8 Jahre relevante BerufserfahrungHohe Motivation, gute Arbeitsmoral, Reife und EigeninitiativeErfahrung und Freude an der Leitung eines TeamSehr gute mündliche und schriftliche Kommunikationsfähigkeiten die einen positiven Einfluss bei Entscheidungsträgern auf hoher Ebene ermöglichen Liebe zum Detail und qualitätsorientierte DenkweiseAnalytische Fähigkeiten zur Problemlösung und Einbringen von kreativen und innovativen IdeenKundenorientierung
Das kann ZS Dir bieten:  ZS ist ein echter Hidden Champion – in Europa fokussieren wir uns auf den Bereich Life Sciences mit europäischen Büros in London, Cambridge, Frankfurt, Berlin und ZürichWir leben eine einzigartige Firmenkultur, in der die Mitarbeitenden im Mittelpunkt stehen. Daher finden regelmäßig Firmenevents und Socials statt, um das Miteinander sowie Inklusion & Diversität zu fördernZS bietet langfristige Karriereperspektiven und Entwicklungsschancen. Es gibt zahlreiche Programme für Mitarbeitende in verschiedenen Lebensphasen- beispielsweise die Women´s Leadership Initiative, FamilieZS, oder flexible ArbeitszeitmodelleWir unterstützen Dich aktiv in Deiner Karriereentwicklung. Ein gutes Supportsystem aus Mentoren und Personal Development Coaches, individueller Beratung sowie Gruppentrainings begleiten Dich auf Deinem beruflichen Weg bei ZS
Weitere Benefits: Betriebliche AltersvorsorgeEin professionelles Umfeld, das Dich in Deiner persönlichen Karriere fordert und fördert Eine umfangreiche Einarbeitung mit Onboarding/ Training in einem unserer BürosMöglichkeit zur Teilnahme und Unterstützung unserer firmeninternen Initativen Regelmäßige (sportliche) Gruppenaktivitäten mit dem TeamKostenlose Teilnahme an Veranstaltungen im TaunusTurm (z.B. Yoga, Zumba, Sound Meditation, Opera Night auf unserem Rooftop, uvm.)Team Lunch während unserer Office MeetingsBreakfastclub: Im monatlichen Turnus bereiten die KollegInnen ein reichhaltiges Frühstück vorSehr gute Verkehrsanbindung zum Willy-Brandt-Platz im Herzen FrankfurtsZudem bieten wir verschiedene Getränke, Obst, Snacks und im Sommer EIS!
Hier findest Du weitere Informationen:www.zs.com,

About the job
            
 
The Strategy and Transactions (SaT) team of EY Cyprus is looking to recruit Senior consultants to work with a high-performing, integrated team which focuses on transactions, providing advice in challenging and interesting projects. We are offering the opportunity to gain a diverse range of experiences and develop a great sense of achievement.About Strategy And TransactionsThe Strategy and Transactions team guides clients to make better, more informed decisions as they buy, sell, separate, integrate, reshape, restructure or rethink their business strategy. We help our clients by providing advice on all aspects of transactions, from inception to execution and completion.Being one of the fastest growing and reputable teams in Cyprus, we remain at the forefront of all major transactions in the island, covering numerous market sectors.Strategy and Transactions offers a wide variety of services. The key competencies include, among others, the below: Lead advisory (M&A)Transaction DiligenceValuations, Modelling & EconomicsRestructuringStrategyBanking transaction advisory servicesReal Estate transaction advisory services
Key responsibilities of the role: Understand, analyse and present a client’s existing/proposed business, identify key strengths and weaknesses and document key findings;Understand key business drivers in a transaction and provide value to the client through insights, factual conclusions and advice;Document main findings that underpin the advice that we provide our clients with;Gather, verify and assess information and formulate views;Plan, prepare and review deliverables in various forms including written reports, presentations and discussions with the client;Assist with proposal preparations for prospective clients;Build on and develop internal and external networks through personal contacts;Build strong internal relationships with members of the SaT team and other EY services;Take responsibility for your own learning and development;Provide coaching / support to other team members.
To qualify for the role you must have: Qualified or in an advanced process of becoming qualified ACA, ACCA, CFA or equivalent professional qualification (e.g. MBA) will be considered an advantageStrong academic record, preferably relating to Accounting, Economics, Finance, Engineering, Physics or MathematicsAdvanced business writing and verbal communication skills both in Greek and EnglishSound financial modelling skillsStrong presentation skillsAbility to work under strict deadlinesStrong analytical, organizational, problem solving and critical thinking skillsEffective written and verbal communication
Ideally, you will also have: Experience in a similar transaction advisory environment / teamData analytics skills (through use of analytics tools and/or a programming language)Skills and attributes for success:Energetic, positive and team player;Strong analytical, interpersonal and communication skills;Flexible with a can-do attitude and a strong eye for detail;Thirsty for learning and development.
What Working At EY OffersEY offers an attractive remuneration package for rewarding both personal and team performance. We are committed to be an inclusive employer and are happy to consider flexible working arrangements. In addition, but not limited to our benefits include: Flexible working arrangements (work from anywhere when possible and flexible work schedule)Friday afternoon offEY Tech MBA and EY Master’s in business AnalyticsEY Badges - digital credentialsMobility programs (if interested to work abroad)Private Medical and Life InsurancePaid Sick LeavePaid Paternity LeaveMaternity, Wedding and New Baby GiftsDress for the OccasionEY Employee Assistance Program (EAP) (counselling, legal and financial consultation services).
About EYEY | Building a better working world EY exists to build a better working world, helping to create long-term value for clients, people and society and build trust in the capital markets.Enabled by data and technology, diverse EY teams in over 150 countries provide trust through assurance and help clients grow, transform, and operate.Working across Assurance, Consulting, Tax, Strategy, and Transactions, EY teams ask better questions to find new answers for the complex issues facing our world today.#betterworkingworldIf you can demonstrate that you meet the criteria above, please contact us as soon as possible.The Exceptional EY Experience. It’s Yours To Build.Apply Now.

About the job
            
 
Business Transformation Consultant Salary range – 85,000-100,000 euros + bonus Location – Germany, (Berlin, Hamburg, Duesseldorf/Koeln, Munich, Ehningen)Flexible working available Candidates must have a consulting background with experience of Healthcare Insurance sector. The RoleYou will work with visionaries from different industries to improve the hybrid cloud and AI journey for the world's most innovative and important companies. Curiosity and a constant quest for knowledge are the foundation of our clients organisation. In and beyond your role, you will develop ideas and find creative solutions that make a difference for a broad network of clients. Our clients organisation encourages your career growth and development opportunities in an environment that recognizes your individual skills and experience. Role and Responsibilities : Business Consultants from our organisation support our clients in identifying and implementing future oriented solutions. Become part of our highly qualified team of consultants who shape the solutions of tomorrow for the insurance industry in a dynamic environment. You will support our clients from strategic consideration through to successful implementation. This is based on your specialist knowledge, industry expertise and strong soft skills as well as a strong focus on business development and transformation projects in the field of digitalization. We offer exciting, challenging projects with insurance customers in Germany, Austria, Switzerland and beyond, and the opportunity to develop your own career in a successful team. Are you analytical, a communicator, passionate about finding solutions, an innovator? Then we are looking for you! What we are looking for:• University degree, preferably in business administration, business informatics, industrial engineering, mathematics or comparable courses of study • Expertise in insurance processes and insurance software products • Proven project experience in the introduction of standard software and transformation of business processes in the insurance industry • Team and/or project management experience • Knowledge of IT trends and their impact on business success • Excellent communication and presentation skills • Language skills: German and English fluent • Willingness to travel in a dynamic project environment What we offer: • Responsible for creating solutions to our clients' business challenges • Teamwork in a global network of experts • Modern solutions, technologies and tools are used in our projects • Personal career development in a global company that adapts to your life plan • Training framework including generally recognized certification options for individual further training • Flexible working models with home office options • Attractive additional benefits, employee leasing, pension scheme and company health management

About the job
            
 
Alkemy è una società internazionale specializzata nell’evoluzione del modello di business di grandi e medie aziende e una public company quotata sul mercato MTA STAR di Borsa Italiana.La nostra mission è di migliorare la posizione di mercato e la competitività delle grandi e medie aziende stimolando l’evoluzione del modello di business in coerenza con l’innovazione tecnologica e i comportamenti dei consumatori. Grazie a un team di più di 1000 persone, integriamo competenze nelle aree di Strategy, Communication, Design, Performance, Technology, Insights & Analytics con un’offerta, pensata per il contesto post-digital, che copre l’intera catena del valore dalla strategia all’implementazione.IL RUOLOPer il potenziamento del team di Strategy Consulting, Alkemy è alla ricerca di profili da inserire con il ruolo di Strategy Consultant (2/4 anni di esperienza).Le risorse verranno inserite a supporto del team Consulting, dedicato ad aiutare i business leader nell’impostazione strategica di percorsi di trasformazione digitale e di innovazione per le loro aziende. Il team Strategy supporta quotidianamente i propri clienti a coniugare una profonda comprensione delle dinamiche di business delle diverse industry, con temi a forte contenuto innovativo in ambito Customer Experience, Big Data, Industry 4.0, Open Innovation, Omnichannel Strategy in modo da massimizzare l’impatto sull’attuale business model e garantirne un’evoluzione in grado di cogliere le opportunità di medio/lungo periodo. Nei nostri progetti valorizziamo competenze di business trasversali, specifiche conoscenze funzionali e discipline digitali.Sede di lavoro: MilanoEsperienza: 2/4 anni in primarie società di consulenzaArea: ConsultingKEY REQUIREMENTSValutiamo giovani talenti con la passione per il digitale e l’innovazione.Sono per noi requisiti fondamentali:· Esperienza pregressa in primarie società di consulenza · Motivazione a lavorare in un ambiente dinamico ed in continua evoluzione· Attitudine alla gestione di progetti complessi, autonomia e lavorare con orientamento alla performance· Capacità di pensare in modo analitico e critico per affrontare nuove sfide e trovare soluzioni promuovendo l’innovazione ed un lavoro orientato alle performance· Spiccata propensione al lavoro di team· Ottima padronanza dell’inglese· Laurea magistrale in materie economiche o scientifiche COSA OFFRIAMOIn Alkemy ci impegniamo costantemente nel creare le migliori condizioni affinché tutte le nostre persone sentano di poter esprimere al meglio il proprio valore ed il proprio talento - e possano sentire Alkemy come casa propria - indipendentemente da genere, età, nazionalità, orientamento sessuale e religioso.Siamo da sempre profondamente convinti che un ambiente di lavoro inclusivo che valorizzi tutte le diversità sia non solo un imperativo valoriale, ma un fattore critico di successo per il nostro business. Aggreghiamo sotto lo stesso tetto persone con professionalità e background molto diversi e da sempre promuoviamo una cultura di condivisione e crescita continua.Eccellenza, Passione, Integrità e Concretezza sono i valori fondanti di Alkemy, che tutti noi condividiamo e che ci guidano nel realizzare la nostra mission. I valori Alkemy definiscono la nostra identità e sono alla base della nostra cultura organizzativa, indirizzano i nostri comportamenti nei confronti di tutte le nostre persone e dei nostri clienti, costruendo evolutivamente il nostro approccio al business.I profili ritenuti in linea verranno contattati entro 20 giorni. Non saranno valutate candidature sprovviste di cv completo allegato. I dati dei candidati verranno trattati ai sensi dell’Informativa Privacy sempre consultabile sul nostro sito alkemy.com

job_title: Consultant en Stratégie Data IA (H/F) - Stage
job_description:
About the job
            
 
DescriptionRejoignez le leader du conseil en Stratégie Data et IA !Qui sommes-nous ?Cabinet de conseil en Stratégie Data et Intelligence Artificielle (IA), AI Builders a été fondé en 2019 par Stéphane RODER, auteur du Guide Pratique de l’Intelligence Artificielle dans l’entreprise, autour de trois valeurs : Expertise, Bienveillance et Excellence.Depuis, le cabinet connait une croissance exponentielle avec aujourd’hui 40 collaborateurs et un chiffre d’affaire qui double tous les ans.Fort de son expertise, AI Builders rencontre un vrai succès auprès de grands groupes du CAC 40 et du SBF120 et, dans la définition et le déploiement de leur Stratégie Data IA.Pourquoi ?Dans un monde ultra compétitif, l’augmentation de la performance et la création de valeur sont au cœur des préoccupations des entreprises.En effet, l'IA change la physionomie des entreprises, transforme des processus entiers, change leurs modèles de coûts opérationnels et permet de créer de nouveaux produits et services.La Data et l’IA permettent de :  Changer la structure de coûts des entreprises Créer de nouveaux produits et services Répondre aux enjeux et objectifs stratégiques des entreprises à court et long terme
Comment ?Une expérience inédite sur le marché !  Des consultants disposant d’une double compétence : Stratégie et Data IA Une méthodologie et un savoir-faire uniques développés en interne AI Builders Research, cabinet d’analyses internes à destination de nos clients et nos consultants
Pourquoi AI Builders ?Nous rejoindre, c’est :  Rejoindre le leader du conseil en stratégie Data et IA ; Participer aux projets industriels Data IA les plus passionnants, challengeants et novateurs ; Travailler en étroite collaboration avec les Directions Générales et les Chief Data Officers de grands groupes ; Bénéficier de AI Builders University, plateforme conçue en interne par des consultants et pour des consultants ; Intégrer la dimension Data et IA dans vos recommandations stratégiques ; Profiter de l’expérience capitalisée dans tous les secteurs d’activité et à tous les niveaux de maturité
Nos +  Equipe talentueuse et passionnée Ambiance stimulante et dynamique (moyenne d’âge 29 ans) Locaux basés dans le 8ème arrondissement (Wework) Télétravail flexible Titres restaurant (pris en charge à 60% par l’entreprise) Afterworks + teambuildings réguliers Séminaire deux fois par an Office manager aux petits soins (paniers de fruits, gouters…)
Notre onboarding et nos formations internes tout au long de votre carrière, vous permettront d’acquérir rapidement un savoir-faire et une autonomie unique. Toutes les clés pour vous faire monter en compétence et devenir l’un des meilleurs spécialistes dans ce domaine !Vos missions :Dans une équipe à taille humaine, vous serez impliqué(e) dans toutes les dimensions du cabinet :Accompagnement des consultants dans la réalisation de leurs missions de conseil en stratégie IA pour le compte des clients de la Société : stratégie d’investissement, nouveaux produits, augmentation de la performance du process, transformation digitale des métiers, nouvelles offres liées à l’utilisation de la Data …Participation à la rédaction de propositions commerciales et à la commercialisation de l’offre de conseil de AI BuildersAccompagnement des consultants dans le développement interne de AI Builders : constitution des offres, analyses stratégiques, benchmarking, formations, afterwork…Profil :Vous avez une première expérience en entreprise, idéalement dans le secteur du conseil.Vous êtes force de proposition, entrepreneur(se) et entreprenant(e).Vous disposez d’un excellent relationnel et vous savez vous adapter à différents interlocuteurs.Vous êtes proactif(ve), de nature curieuse et très engagé(e), et vous aimez travailler en équipe.Enfin, vous êtes ambitieux(se) avec une forte volonté de monter en compétences.Compétences :Vous êtes en dernière année d’un cursus Bac + 5 ou Bac + 7 (école de commerce ou d’école d’ingénieurs) ou Master Data et IA ou en MBA et vous recherchez un stage de fin d’études d’une durée de 6 mois. Vous êtes attiré(e) par le conseil en transformation digitale.Vous avez une appétence marquée pour les sujets de pointe liés aux transformations Data IA des entreprises et une bonne connaissance du monde de l’IA et de la Data.Vous avez une bonne capacité d’analyse et un esprit critique développé.Vous êtes pragmatique, curieux(se) et méticuleux(se) et vous savez mener un entretien.Vous êtes d’un naturel sociable, savez faire preuve d’écoute attentive et disposez d’un bon sens de l’organisationVous êtes motivé(e) par une potentielle intégration en CDI au sein d’AI Builders en tant que consultant junior.Rejoignez AI Builders et devenez un(e) expert(e) de la Stratégie Data IA des entreprises !Vous pensez être fait(e) pour ce stage ? Vous avez des questions ? Contactez-nous !

About the job
            
 
Wir sind immer auf der Suche nach Menschen, die Veränderungen vorantreiben und Einfluss auf die Welt von morgen nehmen möchten. Denn genau das macht das Arbeiten bei Accenture aus. Wir unterstützen Organisationen dabei, über sich hinaus zu wachsen und neue, innovative und digitale Wege zu gehen, die Vorbilder für uns alle sein können und suchen dafür einen Consultant- Business Model (all genders), der unser Team im Bereich Business Model unterstützt.Du wirst Teil der Practice IX-Connectivity, welche digitale Prozesse und Strukturen aufbaut und implementiert, insbesondere in den Fokusthemen Data Strategy, Servitization, Sustainability, Strategy Assessment und Business Model. Mit Deiner Expertise bist Du verantwortlich für die Beratung von Organisationen bei der Entwicklung und Erweiterung von Geschäftsmodellen zur Steigerung ihres Wachstums und ihrer Wettbewerbsfähigkeit und befähigst darüber hinaus Zukunftstechnologien für Innovationen des Geschäftsmodells zu nutzen.Diese Position ist auch an folgenden Standorten möglich: Berlin, Bonn, Köln, Düsseldorf, Hamburg, München, StuttgartDas erwartet dichAnalyse bestehender Geschäftsmodelle, Strategien und Produktportfolios sowie Identifizierung von OptimierungspotenzialenKonzeptionelle Verantwortung für die Entwicklung, Erweiterung und/oder Umgestaltung von Geschäftsmodellen, die das Wachstum und die Wettbewerbsfähigkeit von Organisationen steigern sowie Begleitung des VeränderungsprozessesEnge Zusammenarbeit mit Organisationen, um individuelle Anforderungen zu verstehen und maßgeschneiderte Lösungen zu entwickelnDurchführung von WorkshopreihenAktive interne Mitarbeit hinsichtlich Methodenentwicklung und ProjektakquiseDarauf freuen wir unsDu verfügst über mehrjährige Beratungs- und/oder Berufserfahrung in den Bereichen Geschäftsfeldentwicklung und Unternehmenstransformation und bringst hervorragendes Verständnis für aktuelle Technologien sowie den Auswirkungen von Trends mitDu hast einen überdurchschnittlichen Universitätsabschluss in einem relevanten Bereich wie Ingenieurwissenschaften, Informationstechnologien oder WirtschaftswissenschaftenMethodenkompetenz und strategische Konzeption gehören zu Deinen Stärken und Du besitzt sehr gute Kommunikations- und Präsentationsfähigkeiten in Deutsch und EnglischReisebereitschaftDeine Vorteile bei unsInnovative Projektumfelder bei namhaften, global agierenden Organisationen ebnen Dir den Weg, Technologien der Zukunft mitzugestalten Stelle Dir aus vielfältigen individuellen Entwicklungsmöglichkeiten Deinen eigenen, persönlichen Karrierepfad zusammen Durch den Zugang zu unserem globalen Netzwerk hast Du die Möglichkeit, auch außerhalb Deiner Heimat neue Erfahrungen zu sammeln Coaching, Training, Mentoring: Wir bieten Dir unsere volle Unterstützung in Sachen persönlicher Entwicklung und geben Dir die Sicherheit, die Du brauchst Dein KontaktDu hast Fragen? Dann wende Dich gerne an unser Recruiting Team per E-Mail an recruiting_germany@accenture.com.Wir freuen uns auf Deine Bewerbung, inklusive Deiner Gehaltsvorstellung und Verfügbarkeit!

job_title: Business & Strategy Consultant Sector Público (Modelo híbrido)
job_description:
About the job
            
 
More digital. More human. More Minsait.Si te apasionan el colaborar en proyectos que tengan un impacto real en clientes del Sector Público y quieres afrontar un nuevo desafío, te invitamos a convertirte en Minsaiter!. Únete a nuestro equipo para contribuir al cambio positivo que deseamos ver en el mundo, mientras creces en tu desarrollo profesional en un entorno estimulante.¿Por qué te encantará ser parte de MBC?:Tendrás flexibilidad para que organices tu jornada cumpliendo con tus objetivos. Para nuestros/as Sr. Consultants este es un factor diferencial.Trabajarás con buena gente, brillante y sentirás el respaldo de la empresa, así como el apoyo de los managers y roles superiores. Nos apoyamos para crecer y aprender juntos.Participarás de un plan de carrera ambicioso con evaluaciones semestrales como incentivo para seguir desarrollándote; además tendrás la oportunidad de aprender, liderar, y desarrollar habilidades con exposición a clientes y autonomía en la ejecución de tus actividades.Este sistema de evaluaciones semestrales es transparente, conocerás desde el inicio las reglas del juego.Cultura con claro enfoque hacia las personas, respeto por el medio ambiente, impacto social y que fomenta de la igualdad de género.Pasión por los resultados.Trabajarás con clientes IBEX líderes en su sector implicándote en proyectos interesantes: Agregarás valor y soluciones a las problemáticas de los clientes.En Minsait Business Consulting, An Indra Company, nuestro propósito se centra en impulsar el crecimiento nuestros los clientes, dejando una huella duradera en la sociedad y logrando un impacto inmediato en su desarrollo. Nos motiva ser catalizador del cambio que queremos ver en el mundo, colaborando para ello en el liderazgo y desarrollo de proyectos y tecnologías que permitan concretar esa visión.¿Cualés serán tus retos como Consultant? Análisis y propuestas de solución: análisis de información para ejecutar propuestas de solución. Esto implica identificar necesidades, riesgos y oportunidades, así como proponer alternativas y mejoras.Gestión de proyectos: planificación, ejecución y seguimiento de tareas, así como garantizar la calidad de los entregables y cumplir con los objetivos establecidos.Relación con el cliente: establecer una relación cercana con el cliente, entender sus necesidades y brindar soluciones que agreguen valor.Desarrollo de equipos: Motivar, formar y guiar a personas con menos experiencia.
¿Qué te hará triunfar en esta posición? Que tengas entre 2 y 4 años de experiencia en consultoría de negocio (reingeniería de procesos, oficina de proyectos, roapmaps, planes directores) en Sector Público o que te interese involucrate en este sector.Se valorará conocimientos en programación en SQL, Python, R y tecnología BI (SAS, Microstrategy, etc)Que seas nativo en español y catalán. Además puedes participar en proyectos internacionales, por lo que es necesario que tengas un nivel de inglés que te permita trabajar en este idioma de manera fluida.Nuestro formato de trabajo es híbrido, por lo que necesitamos que residas en Barcelona.
MBC, the place to beNuestro compromiso es promover ambientes de trabajo en los que se trate con respeto y dignidad a las personas, procurando el desarrollo profesional de la plantilla y garantizando la igualdad de oportunidades en su selección, formación y promoción ofreciendo un entorno de trabajo libre de cualquier discriminación por motivo de género, edad, discapacidad, orientación sexual, identidad o expresión de género, religión, etnia, estado civil o cualquier otra circunstancia personal o social.

About the job
            
 
Als senior management consultant adviseer je onze opdrachtgevers bij complexe verandertrajecten. Denk bijvoorbeeld aan het inrichten van data governance binnen een financiële instelling, of adviseer je een overheidsinstelling rondom data gedreven werken.Maar na het opleveren van het advies is het werk nog niet gedaan. We zijn niet voor niets een veranderbureau! Eigenlijk begint het dan pas: jij zorgt dat het advies wordt omzet in concreet resultaat. Je hebt vanuit je adviesrol een belangrijk rol bij de implementatie. Van het inrichten van processen, het ontwerpen van een nieuwe organisatiestructuur tot het begeleiden van de organisatie bij de verandering. Als management consultant doe je wat nodig is om de opdrachtgever verder te helpen. We ontzorgen en gaan pas weg als het werkt.Als management consultant bij Bisnez adviseer je directies en management op strategisch niveau. Soms doe je dat zelfstandig of in teamverband met collega’s vanuit Bisnez, maar het kan ook zijn dat je als senior adviseur onderdeel bent van een projectteam van de opdrachtgever.Naast het uitvoeren van opdrachten bij onze opdrachtgevers, ben je gedreven om mee te bouwen aan Bisnez. Als senior management consultant bij Bisnez ben je dé gesprekspartner van klant en prospect; je gaat aan de slag als sparringpartner op directieniveau voor onze opdrachtgevers. Naast het uitvoeren van opdrachten, breng je ook nieuwe relaties tot stand. Daarvoor schrijf je mee aan goed onderbouwde offertes en rapporten. Vanuit jouw specialisatie in procesmanagement, datamanagement, informatiemanagement, governance of control krijg je bij ons de vrijheid om te ondernemen.Is dit jouw profiel? Een afgeronde WO-opleiding (bijv. bedrijfs-/bestuurskunde, organisatiewetenschappen, informatiemanagement of vergelijkbaar)Minimaal 10 jaar ervaring in het uitvoeren van adviesopdrachten en het begeleiden van implementatietrajecten op strategisch/tactisch niveau in de publieke sector (gemeenten, Rijksoverheid, zorginstellingen, onderwijs etc.), financiële instellingen (bank- en verzekeringswezen) en/of corporates.Affiniteit met thema’s gericht op de bedrijfsvoering van organisaties (processen, governance, informatie-/datamanagement, financieel management en control)Toegang tot een goed, eigen netwerkJe weet als geen ander vanuit de inhoud de relatie vorm te gevenJe beschikt over een groot relatienetwerk, bij voorkeur binnen het Bank- en verzekeringswezen, Overheid, Zorg, Energiemarkt, Infrastructuur of UtilitiesJe bent gedreven om het relatiebestand van Bisnez uit te breiden
De volgende eigenschappen vinden wij belangrijk: TeamspelerPrestatie gedrevenEen hunter met oog voor kansenGevoel voor het managen van relatiesResultaatgerichtOndernemendJe beschikt over de ‘gun-factor’ dankzij je positieve instelling en hands-on mentaliteitJe neemt van nature snel en soepel de leiding op jeEmotioneel intelligentGevoel voor je omgevingVol overtuigingskrachtDe drive om mee te willen bouwen aan een groeiende, ambitieuze organisatie
Dit is wat wij bieden... Wij hebben een rotsvast vertrouwen in ons aannamebeleid en bieden je bij een match daarom meteen een vast contract aan.Al onze collega’s krijgen een vast salaris met mooie bonusregeling, inclusief een marktconform pakket aan secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden zoals leaseauto (en/of reizen met OV), iPhone, laptop, pensioenvoorziening etc.De mogelijkheid om jezelf verder te ontwikkelen, zowel door coaching als verschillende interne en externe opleidingsmogelijkheden.Veel verantwoordelijkheidWerken binnen een hecht team van ambitieuze mensen, van jonge professionals tot ervaren management consultants die uitblinken in hun vak. Allemaal collega’s die je met raad en daad bijstaan.Een team dat elkaar zowel binnen als buiten werktijd opzoekt, bijvoorbeeld tijdens één van de door ons georganiseerde teamevents zoals het jaarlijkse weekend weg met alle collega’s en hun partners, borrels en diners, skiën in de Alpen of fietsen in de Elzas.
Meer weten of reageren?Herken jij jezelf in bovenstaande vacature? Spreekt onze verbondenheid en ambitie om opdrachtgevers iedere dag weer het beste van onszelf te geven jou aan, reageer dan op deze vacature. Wij werken alleen met vaste contracten, niet met ZZP- constructies. Heb je nog vragen, neem contact op met Annette Kramer en Janet Husen via solliciteren@bisnez.com.

About the job
            
 
You must have valid Irish, UK, or EU work rights to be considered for this roleLocation: Cherrywood, Dublin 22 with hybrid workingAbout the TeamWe are seeking a Strategy and Innovation Consultant to join the Aviva Life & Pensions Ireland (ALPI) Strategy teamThis is an excellent opportunity for a highly motivated, curious and innovative individual who has a strong understanding of the Life & Pensions industry or financial services strategy formulation, accomplished in-house or strategy consulting. Reporting to the Head of Strategy and Product Governance, you will support ALPI’s expansive growth strategy, developing innovative initiatives which meet true customer needs. If not coming from a specifically strategic background this position may suit you if you're coming from a commercial background in the industry, or a customer needs analysis or propositions background. This position will have exposure to our UK organisation as we build out our competitive intelligence hub.You will build ALPI’s competitive intelligence hub, developing a detailed understanding of both local and select international market landscapes, industry mega-trends, product and distribution developments, as well as other key areas such as regulatory change, consumer behavioural trends, and the M&A landscape in Ireland.As part of your role, you’ll forge positive relationships with the wider team across the ALPI and the Aviva Group. We’re looking for someone with excellent communication and stakeholder management skills, whose personal impact enables them to challenge and positively influence at all levels. You’ll support with defining our strategy and strategic objectives and being a trusted adviser to key functions across the Life business including CEO Office, Commercial, Operational and Finance Executives and support them to develop their respective functional strategies.You’ll also work closely with ALPI’s Transformation function, supporting the development of compelling investment initiatives, project planning and ongoing support for of a range of high impact strategic programmes.Duties and Responsibilities: Focus on bringing data driven insights into ALPI's strategy development process, and lead on strategic analysis & reporting.Collaborate with the Product, Pricing & Marketing function to build innovative customer led initiatives which deliver compelling benefits for our customers and shareholders.Lead presentations and collaborative workshops with a range audiences across the company to build and test strategic hypothesis.Support the delivery of a variety of high-impact projects, demonstrating strong analytical / project management skills.Manage strategic reporting for Ireland Life Executive Committee, ALPIDAC Board and Aviva Group where required.Develop relationships with Aviva Group counterparts, and build an in depth understanding of strategic priorities of other Aviva business units to create opportunities to partner with a "One Aviva" approach.Support the development and growth of our business, and actively engage with delivery of pitches and presentations to internal and external stakeholders where required.Analyse and develop deep insights on business performance, core performance metrics, and support in preparation of business performance reviews.
Skills and experience we’re looking for: A problem-solver with strong commercial skills, coupled with excellent project management / facilitation ability.Excellent written communication and presentation skills, including advanced skills in MS Office packages (particularly PowerPoint).Ability to navigate and summarise complicated topics into clear, concise, and compelling messages across various audiences (e.g., colleagues, Executive Committee, Boards).A resilient individual, with strong ability to influence and communicate across the business.Self-motivated, with an ability to use independent judgment, prioritise, handle multiple issues and challenges and adapt to changing demands.Life & Pensions market experience preferable, but wider Financial Services experience also considered.Degree or equivalent professional experience.
What will you get for this role?  A competitive market leading salary depending on skills, experience, and qualificationsGenerous pension (employee contribution matching of up to 14% if you contribute 8%)Annual performance related bonus and pay reviewHoliday allowance of 29 days plus bank holidays, and the option to buy/sell up to 5 additional daysFree car parkingGenerous Health & dental insurance contributions after six monthsAviva Matching Share Plan and Save As You Earn scheme and Approved Profit Share SchemeCycle to Work benefit schemeTaxSaver Travel SchemeFamily friendly parent’s (matching paternity and maternity leave) and carer’s leave.Up to 40% discount for some Aviva products plus discounts for Friends and FamilyEmployee Assistance ProgrammeVolunteering daysProfessional qualification support and transparent career progression plans
Aviva is for Everyone Our diversity and inclusion policies and initiatives are shaping an environment where everyone feels welcome regardless of age, disability, race, ethnicity, gender, gender identity, religion, culture, sexual orientation, national origin, marital status, pregnancy, maternity or those with other caring responsibilities. Our approach helps to ensure that Aviva is a place which values difference and provides equal opportunities for all.We flex locations, hours and working patterns to suit our customers, business, and you.Our smart working combines the benefits of flexibility with time together with colleagues.We prefer all applications to be submitted online, however if you require an alternative method of applying, please contact sophie.keely@aviva.com or at 086 1584943.

About the job
            
 
Bloomreach is the world’s #1 Commerce Experience Cloud, empowering brands to deliver customer journeys so personalized, they feel like magic. It offers a suite of products that drive true personalization and digital commerce growth, including: Discovery, offering AI-driven search and merchandising Content, offering a headless CMS Engagement, offering a leading CDP and marketing automation solutions 
Together, these solutions combine the power of unified customer and product data with the speed and scale of AI optimization, enabling revenue-driving digital commerce experiences that convert on any channel and every journey. Bloomreach serves over 850 global brands including Albertsons, Bosch, Puma, FC Bayern München, and Marks & Spencer. Bloomreach recently raised $175 million in a Series F funding round, bringing its total valuation to $2.2 billion. The investment was led by Goldman Sachs Asset Management with participation from Bain Capital Ventures and Sixth Street Growth. For more information, visit Bloomreach.com.Become a Business Consultant (US hours) at Bloomreach! If you want to help top e-commerce businesses boost their performance, serve clients and get experience globally and have immediate, tangible results, join our Professional Services team as a Business Consultant. Your salary starts at 2 200€ per month, along with stock options and other benefits. You might work in one of our Central European offices or from home on a full-time basis.Tasks and responsibilities: As a business consultant you will be responsible for delivering value to Bloomreach’s clients through the deployment and use of our Engagement PlatformYou will be supporting clients in the implementation phase with business requirements gathering, preparation of the data structure, data migration process and automated programes deploymentYou will be a key advisor for clients regarding e -commerce, analytics, data management, digital marketing, marketing automation and emailing + mobile technologiesYou will be responsible for building strong relationships with clients by bringing continuous improvement to their business, maximising utilization of the platform and improving their KPIs/ROI In a collaboration with Customer Success Manager you will be responsible for developing business strategy and a roadmap with clients as well as aligning with them on relevant business goals and critical metricsOn top of the overall knowledge, you will become an expert in chosen part of the platform in order to lead and advise clients and internal stakeholders in a given topic of expertiseYou will play a pivotal role in clients’ onboarding, platform adoption and product features utilizationYou will be collaborating with various internal teams to build services focused around the product and contribute for internal process improvementYou will be supporting our US based clients working US hours: 3 pm - 12 am
What we expect of the candidate: Ideally 2-3 years of experience in a consulting role within a SaaS environmentWorking knowledge of at least one of email, sms, social ads in the marketplace, etc.Experience in the following sectors/fields: online analytics, performance marketing, marketing automation, data science, A/B testing, personalisation, campaign optimisation, customer lifetime value, e-mailing automation, reactivation, attribution modelling, prediction, product recommendations, e-commerceKnowledge of ecommerce business and business trends, and the ability to understand clients’ business models and adapt consulting approach accordinglyExcellent consulting skills: clear written and verbal communication, presentation skills, confidence in dealing with business users and stakeholders at all levels of seniority, exceptional organizational skills, proactive problem solving skillsAbility to handle difficult situations in a proactive, goal-oriented, and highly professional wayProactively maintain the highest level of expertise by deepening your knowledge of the Bloomreach Engagement platform and solutions through internally and externally available learning opportunities, as well as self-studyNative or professional fluency in English.
More things you'll like about Bloomreach:Culture: A great deal of freedom and trust. At Bloomreach we don’t clock in and out, and we have neither corporate rules nor long approval processes. This freedom goes hand in hand with responsibility. We are interested in results from day one. We have defined our 5 values and the 10 underlying key behaviors that we strongly believe in. We can only succeed if everyone lives these behaviors day to day. We've embedded them in our processes like recruitment, onboarding, feedback, personal development, performance review and internal communication. We believe in flexible working hours to accommodate your working style. We work remote-first with several Bloomreach Hubs available across three continents. We organize company events to experience the global spirit of the company and get excited about what's ahead. We encourage and support our employees to engage in volunteering activities - every Bloomreacher can take 5 paid days off to volunteer*.The Bloomreach Glassdoor page elaborates on our stellar 4.6/5 rating. The Bloomreach Comparably page Culture score is even higher at 4.9/5 
Personal Development: We have a People Development Program -- participating in personal development workshops on various topics run by experts from inside the company. We are continuously developing & updating competency maps for select functions. Our resident communication coach Ivo Večeřa is available to help navigate work-related communications & decision-making challenges.*Our managers are strongly encouraged to participate in the Leader Development Program to develop in the areas we consider essential for any leader. The program includes regular comprehensive feedback, consultations with a coach and follow-up check-ins. Bloomreachers utilize the $1,500 professional education budget on an annual basis to purchase education products (books, courses, certifications, etc.)* 
Well-being: The Employee Assistance Program -- with counselors -- is available for non-work-related challenges.* Subscription to Calm - sleep and meditation app.* We organize ‘DisConnect’ days where Bloomreachers globally enjoy one additional day off each quarter, allowing us to unwind together and focus on activities away from the screen with our loved ones. We facilitate sports, yoga, and meditation opportunities for each other. 
Compensation: Restricted Stock Units or Stock Options are granted depending on a team member’s role, seniority, and location.* Everyone gets to participate in the company's success through the company performance bonus.* We offer an employee referral bonus of up to $3,000 paid out immediately after the new hire starts. We celebrate work anniversaries -- Bloomversaries!* 
(*Subject to employment type. Interns are exempt from marked benefits, usually for the first 6 months.)If this position doesn't suit you, but you know someone who might be a great fit, share it - we will be very grateful!Any unsolicited resumes/candidate profiles submitted through our website or to personal email accounts of employees of Bloomreach are considered property of Bloomreach and are not subject to payment of agency fees.

¿Tienes experiencia en proyectos de innovación y quieres continuar desarrollándote en un ambiente joven y dinámico? ¡Te estamos buscando!Desde FI GROUP creemos en el progreso de la sociedad, y por ello apostamos por la I+D+i como la clave para cambiar el presente y mejorar el futuro. Disfrutarás de jornada flexible cada día y jornada intensiva los viernes y en verano.Modelo de trabajo híbrido (Presencial/Ework).Sistema de Retribución flexible. Podrás personalizarlo según tus intereses, teniendo opción a Ticket Restaurant, Tickets Guardería y/o Tarjeta Transporte.Dispondrás de fruta y snacks en la oficina.Plan de carrera y formación individualizados.Para nosotros es fundamental el buen ambiente, podrás disfrutar con tus compañeros/as de diferentes actividades (afterworks, actividades solidarias y deportivas, etc.).

About the job
            
 
We are currently seeking a Strategy Consultant ESG at all levels to join our team. Candidates ideally have previous experience of working as a Strategy Consultant ESG in some capacity for, or at large organisations, on digital transformation initiatives.Your roleThis position is within the Benelux team, which focusses on providing advice and guidance to customers on IT Strategy, Enterprise Architecture, and Solution Architecture.As an Strategy Consultant ESG, you will deliver value and excellence to our customers through key project engagements, and you will also support the growth of the Technology Modernization Consulting practice. Our services focus on the agendas of the Chief Information Officer (CIO), the Chief Technology Officer (CTO) and/or product/platform owners, on mainly Digital & Emerging Technologies and Technology Transformation.Responsibilities:  Shape, contribute, and deliver value through advisory consultancy, and transformational delivery engagements Connect and collaborate with teams across our business in the development and presentation of proposals to clients Work with account teams to support opportunity identification, qualification, and sales Develop a cross practice understanding of service offerings to ensure effective consultative selling Use your personal contacts and networking skills to help grow our consulting pipeline You are able to develop client ready ESG strategy support Contribute to the development of a knowledge management led approach ensuring the development of reusable collateral from assignments Team building: promote empowerment of the team, ensure that each team member is fully engaged in their projects and our team, making meaningful contributions, and encourage a sustainable pace with high levels of quality for the team
Your Team:The Technology Modernization Consulting practice at Cognizant helps clients to reimagine, redefine, and transform their businesses through technology. We bring unparalleled levels of insight, innovation, and delivery velocity to help our clients become digital leaders and enable them to create disruption within their industry. We do this by employing the best people in the industry, working with a single-minded focus and a pragmatic, hands-on approach to delivering technology strategy and solutions.What We Offer:  A fair salary based on your qualities and experience Access to Udemy, Cognizant Academy digital libraries for your continuous learning NS business card to cover your commute expenses. 25 days of paid holiday per year A laptop and a smartphone A pension scheme Health insurance Organization driven by technology – we have a tremendous technology backbone Open, ‘can do’ team spirit and international environment that encourages making your ideas reality! 32-40 hour working week Possibility to work 2-3 days a week remotely
What You Will Bring To The Team:  Experience or expertise in any of the following areas: IT Strategy Development, Sustainability Development, ESG Consultant, CSRD Specialist, IT Operating Model design, IT Portfolio Management, or Merger & Acquisition Services Previous experience in an IT Strategy Advisory or Technology Consulting role is preferred Experience of working across multiple industry sectors (preferred) Strong stakeholder management and relationship building skills at senior levels that will enable consensus building and shaping technology direction Very strong inquisitive and critical thinking skills, communication and presentation skills, and a relationship builder with the ability to convince Energetic and free thinking; open to lead and coach, and be coached
About CognizantCognizant is one of the world’s leading professional services companies, transforming clients’ business, operating and technology models for the digital era. Our unique industry-based, consultative approach helps clients envision, build and run more innovative and efficient businesses. Headquartered in the U.S., Cognizant, a member of the NASDAQ-100, ranked in the Fortune 500 and consistently listed among the most admired companies in the world.Diversity And Inclusion At Cognizant:At Cognizant, we believe diversity and inclusion are at the heart of our ability to execute successfully and consistently over the long term. We recognize that our people are our most important asset. We strive to create an environment where all associates feel comfortable to be themselves, feel accepted and can therefore thrive both personally and professionally. We continue to drive D&I throughout our organization to unlock the insights, imagination and innovation of our associates, as well as reflect the diversity of our clients and communities. We are a Dutch and European Top Employer and continually drive employment recognition and engagement through employee friendly policies and affinity groups such as “Women Empowered”, “Embrace LGBTQ+” and “Race Equality Network”. For more information, see https://careers.cognizant.com/global/en/diversity-and-inclusionDescription Of The Recruitment Process:Step 1: Written application/CV will be reviewed by the recruitment teamStep 2: Conversation with the recruiterStep 3: Technical interview with the teamStep 4: Business interview with the teamStep 5: OfferRecruiter contact detailsName: Quessia RajohanesaEmail address: quessia.rajohanesa@cognizant.comPhone: +31 6 11 38 45 44Employee Status : Full Time EmployeeShift : Day JobJob Posting : Oct 18 2023About CognizantCognizant (Nasdaq-100: CTSH) is one of the world's leading professional services companies, transforming clients' business, operating and technology models for the digital era. Our unique industry-based, consultative approach helps clients envision, build and run more innovative and efficient businesses. Headquartered in the U.S., Cognizant is ranked 185 on the Fortune 500 and is consistently listed among the most admired companies in the world. Learn how Cognizant helps clients lead with digital at www.cognizant.com or follow us @Cognizant.

About the job
            
 
Entra nel nostro mondo.Trasforma insieme a noi.Strategy Consultant Quale sarà la tua sfida?Sarai parte attiva della crescita del nostro team Strategy, Innovation e Marketing, la nostra pratice più giovane, nata dalla fusione delle competenze necessarie per accelerare la crescita dei nostri clienti: individuare spazi di opportunità, sviluppare prodotti e servizi, innestarli su un modello di business sostenibile e portarli sul mercato.L’unico modo di farlo bene è integrare competenze che tradizionalmente operano in contesti separati, e per questo motivo SIM riunisce professionisti di consulenza strategica, innovazione, marketing, brand e comunicazione creativa.All’interno di questo contesto avrai modo di partecipare a progetti in diversi ambiti: M&A, Market entry strategy, Business model definition, Industrial&Strategic plan, Organizational Design e Sizing and Forecasting Models.Sarai tu ad entrare nel nostro team?Hai l’abilità di pensare “out of the box”, sei determinato/a, ti piace lavorare con le persone, ti appassionano tematiche di innovazione e tecnologie e hai voglia di mettere in campo le tue idee e le tue capacità?Di seguito puoi approfondire i requisiti e le caratteristiche della persona che stiamo cercando:   Esperienza fino a 3 anni maturata in società strutturate o società di consulenzaLaurea in Ingegneria (preferibilmente gestionale o energetica)Competenze su analisi, disegno e miglioramento dei processi, ottimizzazione delle risorse in termini di dimensionamento e competenze, definizione dei requisiti di sistema e change managementCompetenze nella raccolta e nella definizione dei business requirement per rispondere alle esigenze del ClienteBuona conoscenza della lingua ingleseL’esperienza nel mondo Energy è considerata un plus
Perchè Bip?People at the center of our cultureFiducia e collaborazione, imprenditorialità e coraggio, meritocrazia e sviluppo guidano la crescita delle nostre persone.Lavorare in BIP è un'esperienza sfidante, in cui il merito paga e l'innovazione avviene attraverso idee coraggiose, collaborazione e un rapporto di fiducia con i nostri clienti. Challenge yourselfAvrai la possibilità di metterti alla prova in contesti progettuali diversi in termini di ambito, natura delle attività e stakeholders coinvolti. Vedrai valorizzato il tuo spirito di iniziativa, la tua passione, l’autonomia e la capacità di assumerti responsabilità e metterti in gioco.Unlocking your potentialPotrai partecipare a + di 300 corsi formativi all’avanguardia per accrescere le tue competenze su tecnologie e temi di business emergenti.Work-life IntegrationTroverai una policy che supporta il lavoro AGILE fino al 100% del proprio tempo e favorisce il work-life integration.Diversity, Equity and InclusionValorizziamo l’unicità e ci impegniamo a garantire che tutte le nostre persone abbiano pari opportunità di dare un contributo ed esprimere al massimo il potenziale nell'ambiente di lavoro.Il nostro approccio alla diversità e all’inclusione si fonda sui principi di etica e integrità e rappresenta il fattore determinante per lo sviluppo di orizzonti, di crescita personale e aziendale, più ampi.Promuoviamo l’inserimento e l’integrazione lavorativa delle persone appartenenti alle categorie protette – in base a quanto disciplinato dalla legge 68/99.Next StepsUna volta ricevuto il tuo cv ci prenderemo del tempo per valutarlo attentamente.Se c’è un match con questa o con altre posizioni aperte all’interno del Gruppo, ti contatteremo per iniziare la nostra conoscenza reciproca.L’iter di selezione comprende generalmente un colloquio con HR, un colloquio tecnico con un line manager ed un eventuale colloquio con un Partner.L’ordine e il numero delle interviste potrebbero variare a seconda delle esigenze di recruiting.In alternativa, saremo felici di conservare il tuo CV nel nostro database per poterlo rivalutare per altre opportunità future.Se dovessi identificare ulteriori posizioni di tuo interesse ed in linea con il tuo profilo, aspettiamo la tua candidatura per poterla valutare nuovamente.Su di NoiNati nel 2003, abbiamo raccolto e valorizzato l’esperienza storica della consulenza e abbiamo aggiunto due ingredienti chiave: l’innovazione e la digitalizzazione.Grazie a questo percorso siamo oggi oltre 5000 professionisti e professioniste, presenti in 13 Paesi, con oltre 4500 progetti alle spalle e le conoscenze più all’avanguardia nell'ambito della Digital Transformation, Data Science, Cybersecurity, Industry 4.0, IOT e di tutte le Disruptive Technologies che mettiamo a servizio di ogni settore di mercato.Aiutiamo i nostri clienti a fare la differenza creando qualità su larga scala attraverso una formula che opera su tre leve: Valore, Persone e Tecnologia.Crediamo nel valore dell’eccellenza, che è la bussola su cui orientiamo il nostro agire, e adottiamo un approccio etico e leale nei confronti di quante e quanti scelgono di lavorare con noi, promuovendo un ambiente in cui le persone possano crescere insieme, grazie alla contaminazione tra competenze diverse.
