About the job
            
 
Wat ga je doen?Als Business Consultant bij Enexis help je éen van de grote Nederlandse netbeheerders bedrijfsprocessen optimaal in te richten. Dat begint met uitzoeken van wat nou precies optimaal is. Daarvoor heb je contact met mensen uit alle geledingen van onze organisatie. Je verdiept je in de belangen van klanten, medewerkers en de organisatie, maar ook in de kaders door wet- en regelgeving en de ruimte die innovatieve automatiseringsmogelijkheden kunnen bieden. Zo kom je tot heldere procesontwerpen en -adviezen die naadloos aansluiten bij onze bedrijfsstrategie.Vervolgens begeleid je projectteams bij het SAFe agile realiseren van procesverbeteringen, op basis van de veranderagenda die je opstelt. Bijvoorbeeld door het ontwikkelen van apps. Als een visionaire bruggenbouwer zorg je zo voor verandering en vooruitgang, zodat we als organisatie de uitdagingen van de energietransitie aankunnen.Belangrijk in deze functie is vooral dat je niet alleen scherp krijgt waaraan nù behoefte is, maar ook over een paar jaar. Je grootste uitdaging wordt ongetwijfeld prioriteren. Door de energietransitie groeit ons werkpakket namelijk gestaag en ondertussen verandert ook nog onze rol als netbeheerder. Over uitdagingen gesproken. Durf jij ‘m aan? Functie-eisenEen rasechte verbinder met een resultaatgerichte aanpak en een verfrissende blik. Op inspirerende wijze zorg je voor draagvlak. Ze help je hele teams stap na stap te maken. Je voelt je thuis in een technische organisatie als de onze en verstaat de kunst op tijd afstand te nemen om in ons bedrijfsbelang te kunnen blijven handelen. Daarbij altijd rekening houdend met wat een verandering betekent voor onze organisatie, processen en systemen.Verder heb jij Minimaal een hbo-diploma (bijvoorbeeld bedrijfskunde);Ervaring met het begeleiden en coördineren van verandertrajecten;Affiniteit met softwareontwikkeling;Kennis van en ervaring met procesmanagement, projectmatig werken en procesontwerpmethodieken (zoals lean, SAFe en agile werken).
Let op: vanwege onze veiligheidsvoorschriften is het bij al onze functies verplicht om Nederlands taalniveau C1 te lezen, te spreken en te schrijven. Team & cultuurEnexis Netbeheer, onderdeel van Enexis Groep, voorziet ruim 3 miljoen huishoudens en bedrijven in Nederland van elektriciteit en gas. Je komt bij ons binnen op een interessant moment. De energietransitie is namelijk in volle gang en dat merk je in elke vezel van onze organisatie. Slim onderhoud, energie terugleveren, aardgasvrij wonen, windenergie opwekken en ga zo nog maar even door, we werken er hard aan om het mogelijk te maken. Dat leidt tot allerlei processen waar jij een waardevolle bijdrage aan kunt leveren.Je gaat als Business Consultant werken in het ketenteam van een onze vier procesketens: Onderhoud en Storingen, Grootverbruik & Netten en Kleinverbruik. Binnen je ketenteam opereer je landelijk en werk je samen met productmanagers, senior consultants en andere business consultants. Reken maar vast op een betrokken club collega’s en veel vrijheid. Zo bieden we voor thuiswerken bijvoorbeeld alle ruimte. Wat krijg je van ons?In ruil voor jouw energie zorgt Enexis goed voor je. Dit mag je verwachten: Een bruto maandsalaris tussen de € 3.854,- en € 7.308,- op basis van 40 uur per week. Dit is inclusief 10% persoonlijk budget en 10,7% dertiende maand. Je kunt deze budgetten flexibel inzetten, bijvoorbeeld voor extra verlofdagen. 8% vakantiegeld over je brutojaarsalaris. We dragen 70% bij aan je ABP Keuzepensioen. De mogelijkheid om je werkweek flexibel in te delen. We vinden een goede balans tussen werk en privé namelijk belangrijk. Dus als je ’s ochtends eerst de kinderen naar school wilt brengen of nog een rondje sportschool wilt doen, helemaal prima.Een jaarlijks vitaliteitsbudget van € 500,-. Bijvoorbeeld voor een sportabonnement of advies van een voedingscoach.Een kilometervergoeding en een mobiliteitskaart met een ov-abonnement 1e klas. Alle ruimte om jezelf verder te ontwikkelen. Dat is voor ons namelijk een topprioriteit. Dus wil je een opleiding of cursus volgen, dan is de kans groot dat we de kosten voor onze rekening nemen.
Zijn wij een match? We investeren graag in duurzame relaties. Om zeker te zijn van een goede match, voeren we daarom een screening uit. Deze verschilt per functie en kan bestaan uit: een assessment en het opvragen van referenties en een verklaring omtrent het gedrag (VOG). Tijdens je sollicitatiegesprek vertellen we je precies waar de screening in jouw geval uit bestaat.SollicitatieprocedureInteresse? Solliciteer direct via de solliciteerbutton en je ontvangt meer informatie over de verdere procedure. Heb je vragen over de functie? Neem dan contact op met Evelien Bartels, corporate recruiter, via evelien.bartels@enexis.nl of 06 – 11 87 05 59.

About the job
            
 
Protime is een succesvolle internationale aanbieder van Workforce Management oplossingen. 🚀 Met onze software en expertise helpen wij bedrijven om efficiënter om te gaan met de tijd van hun werknemers: hun Human Capital, dus.Als Interne Business Consultant speel je een belangrijke rol in de verdere groei van Protime. Dit zie jij jezelf doen? Je bent verantwoordelijk voor bedrijfsprocessen die meerdere afdelingen/landen omvatten.Je brengt huidige en toekomstige processen in kaart (je beschrijft AS IS en TO BE situatie) door bv. proces analyses, workshops of gesprekken met key-users of leidinggevenden. Je identificeert mogelijke verbeteringen en potentiële risico’s.Je bekijkt aanvragen tot verbeteringen vanuit de business kritisch en stelt de juiste vragen om tot de essentie van de nood te komen.Je houdt overzicht op welke rollen, afdelingen, landen het proces impact heeft en betrekt de juiste mensen.Je fungeert als project / change manager bij het implementeren en doorvoeren van wijzigingen, van A (aanvraag) tot Z (opleiding). Je neemt ook deel aan test- en implementatiefasen van changes, je begeleidt ze en volgt ze op. Bij aanpassingen in de systemen volg je de voortgang en opgeleverde functionaliteiten op in nauwe samenwerking met je technische collega.Je focust in je projectopvolging op change begeleiding. Je houdt voortdurend het ‘waarom’ in de gaten en je brengt de waarde van de verandering scherp in kaart. Je legt de juiste prioriteiten en stuurt bij waar nodig.In al je taken, communiceer je duidelijk naar alle stakeholders van het project.
Dit ben jij? Je hebt een sterk strategisch inzicht, kan goed verbinding leggen en bent een ondernemer. Je ben iemand die een impact kan maken en anderen kan inspireren, enthousiasmeren en motiveren.Je bent een geboren analist met kennis van bedrijfsprocessen. Je hebt ervaring binnen business analyse, functionele analyse of in een proces- en projectgedreven functie. Kennis van BPMN en/of een projectmanagement methodologie is een pluspunt.Bij het managen van changes heb jij oog voor het menselijk aspect. Je zorgt dat de juiste mensen betrokken zijn en draagt de visie vol enthousiasme uit.Je bent besluitvaardig, maar tegelijkertijd voldoende flexibel om in te spelen op onverwachte zaken. Je bent in staat om hoofd- van bijzaak te onderscheiden.Je kan professioneel communiceren in het Nederlands en het Engels. Frans is een pluspunt.
Waarom zou jij voor Protime kiezen? Je komt terecht in een kwaliteitsbewuste en snelgroeiende omgeving. Je krijgt de mogelijkheid om een zichtbare bijdrage te leveren aan de ambitieuze groeidoelstellingen bij een solide bedrijf.Ons feestcomité (ProParty) organiseert ontspanning van alle soorten en maten: feestjes, board game nights, after work drinks, movie nights, LAN-parties, … You are invited!Ons HQ is gevestigd in een mooi kantoor: pooltafel, yogahoek, terrassen, fitnessruimte, game room, … allemaal op wandelafstand van Mechelen city.De werkuren en -locatie zijn flexibel. Je kan afwisselend van onze kantoren en van thuis werken.Je werkt samen met collega's die allemaal graag de extra mile gaan.Je brutoloon wordt aangevuld met een wagen en tankkaart (/laadpas), nettovergoeding, maaltijdcheques, hospitalisatieverzekering, groepsverzekering, ecocheques, eindejaarspremie, jaarbonus, voucher voor een GSM, GSM-abonnement, FIP-plan (Flex Income Plan of cafetariaplan).

About the job
            
 
Für unser Zentrales Programmmanagement am Standort Wolfsburg-Hattorf suchen wir zum nächstmöglichen Zeitpunkt unbefristet einenStrategieberater (m/w/d)Arbeiten bei Sumitomo Electric Bordnetze (SEBN) bedeutet: vernetzt sein. Mit Kolleginnen und Kollegen, Partnern und Kunden. Und vor allem mit der Zukunft des Automobils. Denn SEBN entwickelt, produziert und liefert modernste Bordnetzsysteme und umfassende Systemlösungen für Kunden in der Automobilindustrie. Unser Unternehmen steht für Stabilität und Kontinuität und wird weltweit für seine Fairness geschätzt. Heute beschäftigen wir bereits über 39.000 Mitarbeiter an 41 Standorten in 14 Ländern. Kommen auch Sie an Bord. Wir freuen uns auf Sie!Ihre neue Stelle und Aufgaben Mitwirkung bei der Entwicklung der Business Center-Strategie, einschließlich der ZielfestlegungUnterstützung der Markt- und Produktstrategien der Business CenterSteuerung von Teilprojekten zur Business Center-StrategieentwicklungZusammenfassung von komplexen Informationen zur Identifizierung von strategischen Chancen und RisikenAbstimmung der Business Center-Strategieprozesse und Unterstützung der Zusammenarbeit zwischen den Business CenternVorbereitung und Moderation von StrategieworkshopsMitwirkung bei der Entwicklung und Einführung von Werkzeugen und Methoden für die künftige Business-Center-Strategieentwicklung von SEBNKoordination des Business Center-StrategiedialogsBeobachtung von Markttrends für die Technologiestrategie und der Wettbewerber in Abstimmung mit dem Bereich Analytics und BenchmarkingInhaltliche Mitarbeit in Arbeitspaketen des Transformationsprozesses
Ihr Profil Fachspezifische Hochschulausbildung, z.B. im Bereich Wirtschaftsingenieurwesen, mit Master-Abschluss oder Abschluss einer Business SchoolMehrjährige fachspezifische BerufserfahrungFundierte Kenntnisse in MS-OfficeSehr gute Deutsch- und Englischkenntnisse
Benefits Modernes Home-Office-Paket und flexible Arbeitszeiten ohne KernarbeitszeitVollzeitbeschäftigung zwischen 35 und 40 WochenstundenTarifliche und leistungsbezogene Vergütung nach IG Metall inkl. Urlaubsgeld, Weihnachtsgeld und bis zu 38 Tagen UrlaubBeteiligung am Unternehmenserfolg, JobRad® sowie eine betriebliche AltersvorsorgeKostenlose Getränke, ein bezuschusstes Betriebsrestaurant, ein Firmenparkplatz sowie MitarbeiterrabatteUnsere Unternehmenswerte: Verantwortung, Respekt, Vertrauen und Zusammenhalt
Sie möchten an Bord kommen?Dann freuen uns auf Ihre Bewerbung über www.sebn-career.com oder per E-Mail an recruitment@sebn.com.

About the job
            
 
Business Transformation Consultant - Milano e RomaIn EY Consulting non troverai soltanto un lavoro, ma un’esperienza formativa che ti porterà ad essere il Transformation Leader del futuro.Vogliamo essere la scintilla che dà vita alle tue ispirazioni e al tuo successo. Per questo motivo ti offriamo tutte le risorse, le competenze tecniche specifiche e le community tematiche, per sviluppare i tuoi interessi e le tue ambizioni.Cerchiamo Transformation leader in grado di guidare trasformazioni complesse attraverso tecnologia, human e innovation, e capaci di coniugare conoscenze tecnologiche e visione del futuro.Qual è il contesto in cui verrai inserito?Il Business Transformation Senior Consultant farà parte del Team di Business Transformation della Service Line Business Consulting di EY, composta da professionisti e professioniste altamente qualificati/e su progettualità di Trasformazione, Innovazione e Reingegnerizzazione, che operano con clienti di diverse Industry dislocati su tutte le sedi italiane, con focus principale a Milano e Roma, e collaborando su iniziative a livello internazionale.Nel dettaglio, nell’ambito dei progetti consulenziali riguardanti la Business Transformation, si svolgono attività in ambito Strategy, Operations e Performance Improvement.Descrizione del ruolo e delle attività Definizione di piani strategici e Business Case, con conseguente capacità di analisi di risultati economico-finanziari dell’azienda cliente;Definizione di strategie di go-to-market con impatti sia sulla top che bottom line dell’azienda cliente;Revisione dell’esperienza cliente e disegno dei customer journey;Implementazione di sistemi di monitoraggio della voce del cliente e della soddisfazione dello stesso;Disegno di modelli e meccaniche di loyalty innovativi, finalizzati alla creazione di valore e di ricavi incrementali;Analisi del quadro organizzativo e delle competenze dell’azienda cliente;Attività di analisi mercato e Benchmarking;Reingegnerizzazione e ottimizzazione di processi di business;Definizione e monitoraggio KPI di business e generazione di insights al fine di identificare azioni di miglioramento;Analisi dei processi, sia front-end che back-end, dell’azienda cliente;Gap analysis e individuazione delle aree di miglioramento;Definizione delle Recommendations, con stima del beneficio economico, prioritizzazione e strutturazione in un Action Plan;Implementazione dell’Action Plan e supporto manageriale-operativo all’azienda cliente;PMO;Messa in atto di strategie di Change Management;Disegno del modello operativo di aree aziendali;Relazioni con i clienti acquisti e potenziali per favorire lo sviluppo di nuove opportunità di business, promuovendo l’offerta del Gruppo e proponendo soluzioni innovative;Set-up & Design di approcci e tool finalizzati al Performance Improvement e alla Business Transformation.
Requisiti richiesti: Esperienza dai 1 ai 5 anni maturata in contesti consulenziali o in aziende di settore, su progettualità di Strategy, Operations, Performance Improvement;Aver maturato significative esperienze lavorative in almeno uno dei seguenti macro settori: Automotive, Mobility, Transportation, Energy, Retail, Media & Telco, Logistica, Assicurativo, Digital Payment, Fashion & LuxoryConoscenza dei principali processi aziendali (commercial, sales, marketing, operations, loyalty etc.) processi;Spiccate doti analitiche ed abilità di interpretare KPI economici e di performance, traducendo l’analisi in Recommendations;Competenze specifiche nella gestione ed implementazione di piani di ottimizzazione dei processi e delle performance;
Completano il profilo: Laurea in Economia, Ingegneria, o affini;Spiccate capacità di analisi e orientamento al risultato;Capacità di interagire a più livelli, in Azienda e sul territorio;Forte attitudine al lavoro di squadra;Ottime capacità di comunicazione e relazione interpersonale;Disponibilità alla mobilità ed a trasferte continue sull’intero territorio italiano;Ottima conoscenza della lingua inglese e del pacchetto Office.
Cosa chiediamo:Una forte voglia di cambiare il mondo, per il meglio. In EY diamo luogo ad una trasformazione, mettendo il nostro purpose - Building a better working world - al centro di tutto ciò che facciamo, e siamo convinti di poter contribuire alla trasformazione del Paese con una forte e precisa idea di futuro e di innovazione.Perché dovresti scegliere EY Consulting?Da subito entrerai a far parte di Team e settori diversificati, partecipando attivamente ai processi di trasformazione e di innovazione di aziende, società e Pubbliche Amministrazioni per creare un impatto sul Paese.Costruirai la carriera che desideri grazie a percorsi di formazione su hard e soft skill, community e poli tecnologici, dove potrai quotidianamente provare, sperimentare e crescere.Questa è la tua opportunità per sviluppare le tue competenze e per fare qualcosa di eccezionale per te, per noi, per il mondo. The exceptional EY experience, it’s yours to build.Cosa ti offriamo in EY?Vogliamo essere il motore delle tue ispirazioni per rendere possibile il tuo successo. Per questi motivi ti offriamo tutte le risorse, le competenze tecniche specifiche e le community tematiche per sviluppare i tuoi interessi e le tue ambizioni.Un ambiente di lavoro internazionale, all’interno di Team diversi e multidisciplinari.Un luogo di lavoro che mette le persone al centro attraverso un modello di leadership trasformativa e percorsi di formazione continui e dedicati.Un luogo che abbraccia la nuova concezione del lavoro flessibile e fa propri valori come la fiducia, l’autonomia e il rispetto tra le persone.Un luogo dove la diversità e l'inclusività sono il fulcro di ciò che siamo e di come lavoriamo.Partnership, convenzioni, programmi e flexible benefit pronti a rispondere a tutte le esigenze e per aiutarti ad esprimere il tuo potenziale e raggiungere qualsiasi traguardo possibile, sia a livello personale che professionale.Supporto di un Tutor e un Counselor, quale guida nella scelta delle esperienze più adatte alle tue ambizioni.Tutte le nostre opportunità prevedono una ricerca costante e continua dell’equilibrio di genere, abilità, esperienza e cultura.Tutte le nostre opportunità si rivolgono anche a persone appartenenti alle categorie protette e prevedono una ricerca costante e continua dell’equilibrio di genere, abilità, esperienza e cultura.Apri la tua carriera a nuovi scenari di crescita ed entra a far parte del Team di EY Consulting. The exceptional EY experience, it’s yours to build.

About the job
            
 
For this job, it is essential to have a good command of the Dutch language!BUSINESS CONSULTANTWil jij de schakel zijn tussen de afdeling Data & IT en de andere afdelingen binnen onze organisatie? Krijg jij energie van het oplossen van complexe puzzels om mooie innovaties bij FM Group te realiseren? Als business consultant bieden wij jou die kans. Met jouw heldere blik op de end-to-end processen in de organisatie help je constant processen te optimaliseren en meer data gedreven te maken. Met jouw goed ontwikkelde soft skills verplaats je je moeiteloos in je gesprekspartners en zo achterhaal jij steeds weer de vraag achter de vraag. Hiermee help je de organisatie om innovatieve projecten te implementeren in Nederland en daarbuiten. Of het nu gaat om het aanpassen van het orderpickproces, het inzichtelijker maken van transportkosten, het ontwikkelen van een nieuwe applicatie, het optimaliseren van ons ERP systeem of het integreren van een bedrijf dat we hebben overgenomen.Denk je aan Nederland, dan denk je aan bloemen! FM Group, marktleider in de sierteeltbranche, opereert wereldwijd en heeft zijn hoofdvestiging in Nederland. Via de uitgebreide webshop kunnen de klanten (bloemisten, groothandel en retail) altijd en overal bestellen uit het ruime assortiment van bloemen, planten en accessoires. Achter deze commerciële propositie gaat een complexe logistieke operatie schuil.WAT GA JE DOEN? Je vertaalt functionele wensen naar processen en IT requirements, bijv. het herinrichten van het logistieke proces.Je begeleidt ontwikkel- en implementatietrajecten, bijv. optimalieren van het ERP systeem.Je vormt de belangrijke schakel tussen IT, de overige afdelingen, IT leveranciers en de organisatie.Je helpt bij het prioriteren van diverse projecten en verbeterkansen.Je ondersteunt bij het integreren van bedrijven die zich aansluiten bij de FM Group.
WIE BEN JIJ? Je bent goed in het doorzien van processen en structuren.Je communiceert makkelijk op alle niveaus en weet jouw gesprekspartners mee te krijgen.Je hebt de overtuigingskracht en organisatiesensitiviteit die nodig is om veranderprojecten succesvol te maken.Je bent iemand die zelfstandig is, zelf actie onderneemt en makkelijk contact maakt.Je bent analytisch sterk, neemt niet klakkeloos alles aan en je bent een doorzetter wanneer het moeilijk wordt.Je hebt HBO of WO werk- en denkniveau (bijvoorbeeld een bedrijfskundige of IT gerelateerde studie).Je hebt een goede beheersing van de Nederlandse en Engelse taal.Ervaring of interesse in processen die aan IT ontwikkeling gerelateerd zijn.Je bent bovenal een enthousiast en ambitieus persoon, die uitdagingen graag met beide handen aangrijpt.Je bent proactief, resultaatgericht, analytisch en pragmatisch.Je bent 28-40 uur per week beschikbaar.
WIL JIJ: Werken in een klein, creatief en gedreven team binnen een grote organisatie?Ruimte om initiatieven te nemen, jezelf te ontwikkelen en opleidingen te volgen?Veel verantwoordelijk en vrijheid in je rol?Werken in een informele en klantgerichte organisatie waar geen dag hetzelfde is?Werken vanuit huis én 2 of 3 dagen per week vanuit onze vestigingen in Aalsmeer (evt. deels in Naaldwijk).Flexibele werktijden.Goede arbeidsvoorwaarden (waaronder een eindejaarsuitkering, pensioenregeling, 25 vakantiedagen bij fulltime dienstverband).Regelmatig een bloemetje van de zaak.
Je kan direct solliciteren via de link. Heb je nog vragen? Neem dan s.v.p. contact op met Vincent Zaal, Manager IT Business Applications: 06-53680126.

About the job
            
 
Maximize your impactAbout the ChallengeHow about using your Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS) skills to help a global company reduce harmful vehicle emissions and give new life to used metals? And see some of the world in the process? That’s what our client has in store for you!As a Business Consultant in the Information Systems (IS) department , you will use your managerial and technical skills as a solution expert for LIMS applications. You will focus on the implementation of LIMS applications and be the point of contact for customers. You will interact with business teams on a global and local level.Your Responsibilities Will Include  Maintain the LIMS Labvantage application modules from a functional and configuration point of view Understand the LIMS landscape and applications Coordinate the business unit's LIMS request pipeline Enable the growth of the platform capabilities Lead and execute small and medium projects, from functional requirements analysis to solution delivery
Your Skills  Bachelor's Degree in Applied IT or Master's Degree in Information Technology or Computer Science, or equivalent through experience Project management experience or interest Good communication and problem solving skills Good knowledge of English (oral, written and presentation), other languages a plus Willingness to travel internationally (EU, Asia and Canada) 30-40% of the time Team player with proven ability to take initiative and innovate
Our offerExellys Isn’t Your Typical Recruiting Or Consulting Agency, We’re a Different Breed. We Are a Tech Talent Incubator, Which Is Every Bit As Cool As It Sounds. Here’s What You Can Expect From Us  You’ll join an awesome community and enter one of our Smart Programs, based on where you are in your career and where you want to go. Did we mention you’ll get a personal coach as well? Next to a generous monthly salary, you'll receive a company car or a flexible mobility budget and tons of other benefits (pension, daily compensations, etc.) You’ll spend most of the time at (y)our client’s, except for regular Exellys trainings, fun events, tribe meet-ups, after works, knowledge sharing sessions, etc. After two years of coaching and upskilling from Exellys, you’ll get the opportunity to join (y)our client’s organization as an internal employee. Or if you prefer to stay with us, you could explore our follow-up Smart Programs as well.

job_title: Principal Consultant (m/f/d) - Allianz Consulting- Transformation & Strategy
job_description:
About the job
            
 
About Us / Who you will join: Allianz Consulting is the internal consulting division of the Allianz Group. Based in Munich, Paris, Milan, Trivandrum, Pune, Singapore, and New York, our dedicated global teams of over 500 consultants share a joint vision: to be the consulting partner of choice for Allianz Group core segments, transforming the future of Allianz from within. We bring deep industrial and functional expertise to fulfill our clients' needs, ranging from strategy, market management, sales and distribution, IT, organization, claims and operations to central functions and Agile methodologies.Allianz Consulting's structure focuses on competencies and delivery. Therefore, we are set-up in so called "practice areas" and "service clusters" that focus on the following topics:  Sales Excellence  Marketing & Customer Excellence  Life Insurance  Agile@Allianz  Resilience & IT Excellence  Digital Ecosystems  Claims Excellence  Products & Pricing  Productivity Excellence  Finance Excellence & Strategy  Legal, Data Privacy & Compliance  People Excellence 
 Key responsibilities / You will get to:   Complete client engagements under the guidance of an Engagement Manager, including all project deadlines and deliverables, troubleshooting and problem resolution, conflict management, client and stakeholder management and all other relevant aspects of the assignments  Analyze customer needs and develop creative concepts to best serve them  Contribute to pitches  Provide support to existing clients while ensuring efficient key account management and help and coach more junior project team members  Oversee the daily operations of the assigned tasks until completion  Discuss with your Engagement Manager ideas of possible future client needs that may lead to projects  General contribution to Allianz Consulting  Ensure development of team members by coaching, mentoring, and personal training 
 Key requirements / What we hope you bring:   University degree or equivalent experience  At least 5 years of relevant insurance industry and/or consulting experience (preferably in the Life Insurance or Asset Management segment)  Project Management & Change-Management experience  Knowledge of Project- and Program Management methods and techniques, process development and continuous improvement  Ability to work in high demanding environments  Conceptual and implementation experience  Facilitation, sales, and conflict management skills  Strong team player with high assertiveness and willingness to go in the lead for topics  Experienced communicator with senior management stakeholders  Advanced knowledge of the Microsoft Office package  Fluent in written and spoken German and English language 
 Desired requirements:   Insurance experience/background  International work experience (min. 6 months)  Affinity to work in an international/cross-cultural environment  Post-graduate degree in Business, Finance, or Insurance  Prior leadership experience  Trained in project management 
 If you already have international experience, or speak German or other languages, we would love to hear more!  Did we spark your interest? Apply now and join us. Let's care for tomorrow. 28682 | Inhouse Consulting | Professional | n.a. | Allianz Services | Full-Time | PermanentAllianz Group is one of the most trusted insurance and asset management companies in the world. Caring for our employees, their ambitions, dreams and challenges, is what makes us a unique employer. Together we can build an environment where everyone feels empowered and has the confidence to explore, to grow and to shape a better future for our customers and the world around us. We at Allianz believe in a diverse and inclusive workforce and are proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We encourage you to bring your whole self to work, no matter where you are from, what you look like, who you love or what you believe in. We therefore welcome applications regardless of ethnicity or cultural background, age, gender, nationality, religion, disability or sexual orientation. Join us. Let's care for tomorrow.

About the job
            
 
Would you like to identify and unlock the business value for your clients while using leading edge technology? Accenture Strategy & Consulting practice are looking for new Strategy Consultants for our Data & AI team. Do you have a passion for transforming businesses with the newest technologies and making them data-driven companies? Are you looking for a place where you can combine your business consulting skills with Data, AI and technology strategy know-how? Then our role as Data Strategy Consultant in our Data & AI practice is a perfect match for you!Description Of The Role And PracticeAccenture Strategy & Consulting enables leaders to act quickly and confidently as they look to the future. Through deep industry understanding, analyzes and insights, we give our customers the opportunity to grow in a new world powered by Data and AI. We are known for our ability to execute quickly, and we help our clients identify the right path to competitiveness by innovating in business and technology. The service unit consists of a wide range of business functions and industry groups, and in Data & AI we work from Strategy to Implementation where Data and AI are the focal points.In your role as Data Strategist, you will work on projects like creating Data and AI strategy, assessing Data and AI business opportunities, and developing and optimizing Data and AI operating models. It can also include supporting complex system implementations powered by Accenture that orchestrate and accelerate results by scaling Data and AI platforms for our customers. Specifically, you can expect to:Define business value based on Data and AIAdvise and help our customers through the changes that Generative AI entailsCommunicate technology, Data and AI solutions and the value they create for the business to C-levelBuild Data and AI strategy that is logical, understandable and executable - anchored with CXOsSupport sales activities with e.g. producing sharp content and message for CXO pitchesAnalyze As-Is and design To-Be AI and Data architecture, tools and processesCommunicate new data-driven insights to inspire and transform the way we do businessMake data discovery, form hypotheses and test these together with the customerMeet some of our dedicated people from the Data & AI team:Camilla Kerlauge, Managing director- LinkedIn profileWilliam Juel, Data Science Consultant- LinkedIn profileElizabeth Poulsen, Data Strategy Manager- LinkedIn profileJais Jørgensen, Strategy Consultant- LinkedIn profileJob RequirementsWe expect you to have a proven track record of successful Data and AI strategy implementations, a history of thought leadership in the field, and the ability to mentor and guide consultants in the team. Furthermore, we expect the following from you:+1 year of relevant experience within Data and/or AIAnalytical Skills: Able to analyze complex data for insightsBusiness Acumen: Understands business strategy and can align data insights with goals Understands the role of Data & AI in business and can identify Data & AI use casesAdaptability and Learning: Open to new tech and industry trends, eager to learn and adaptCommunication Skills: Can convey technical info clearly to diverse audiencesTechnical Proficiency: Proficient in data tools, programming, statistics, mathematics, data modelling and AI techExecution & leadership: Attention to detail, problem-solving skills, and the ability to work collaboratively as part of a teamRelevant Science/Engineering/Business Master's degree with strong GPAGood written and oral presentation skills in English and Danish or another Nordic languageWhat We Can OfferGreat development opportunities to build your professional career based on your own aspirations, having support from your own mentor.The opportunity to work for the biggest companies in Denmark and the Nordics.Collaboration with a global network of talented, passionate colleagues and experts within your industry. Active Nordic and international communities.Access to comprehensive tools and frameworks supported by our global organization – including methodology, knowledge databases and benchmarks.Extensive education programs and development opportunities to develop your business acumen, technical and professional skills.Volunteering opportunities locally and around the world.A diverse, inclusive, and socially active workforce.Benefits package with competitive salary, bonus, pension, health insurance, employee share purchase program and other benefits.Good arrangements for combining family life with work and active support for mental health.Apply nowApply online below. Remember to attach CV, university grades and cover letter. We look forward to receiving your application. If you have any questions regarding the recruitment process, please contact recruiting lead Therese Bals, therese.bals@accenture.com. Accenture welcomes and encourages applications from diverse backgrounds related to gender, age, ethnicity, culture, race, religion and belief, disability, nationality, sexual orientation, and gender identity. Inclusion and diversity are fundamental to our culture and core values, providing an environment where everyone brings distinct experience, talent and culture to their work. We invite you to be part of this diversity!About AccentureAccenture is a global professional services company with leading capabilities in digital, cloud and security. Combining unmatched experience and specialized skills across more than 40 industries, we offer Strategy & Consulting, Interactive, Technology and Operations services—all powered by the world’s largest network of Advanced Technology and Intelligent Operations centers. Our 740,000 people deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity every day, serving clients in more than 120 countries. We embrace the power of change to create value and shared success for our clients, people, shareholders, partners, and communities. Visit us at our homepage: Accenture | Let there be change, LinkedIn: Accenture Nordics | LinkedIn , Facebook: Accenture Danmark | Facebook, Twitter: Accenture Denmark (@Accenture_DK) / Twitter and or Youtube: Accenture Nordics - YouTube.

About the job
            
 
Du suchst ein innovatives, agiles Arbeitsumfeld im Digital Business und E-Commerce-Bereich, bei dem Du Impact auf Champions sowie Hidden Champions hast? Dann bist Du hier richtig! Werde Wegbegleiter der digitalen Transformation und unterstütze unser fantastisches Team.What you can expect In unseren Projekten unterstützt Du eigenverantwortlich, eingebettet in unsere Projektteams, die Führungskräfte namhafter Kunden aus unterschiedlichsten Branchen bei der Digitalisierung ihres Kerngeschäfts.Du übernimmst frühzeitig Verantwortung für (Teil-)Projekte, Fachthemen und Menschen in Abhängigkeit von Deiner Erfahrung.Du überführst topaktuelle Technologie-Trends in neuartige Geschäftsideen und leitest daraus tragfähige Geschäftsmodelle und Strategien ab.Durch Kunden-, Wettbewerbs- und Best-Practice-Analysen schaffst Du fundierte Entscheidungsgrundlagen und Wissens- und Erfahrungsträger auf Kundenseite bindest Du in innovativen Workshop-Formaten gezielt in die Ergebnisgestaltung ein.
This is what you bring along Ein überdurchschnittlich abgeschlossenes Studium, idealerweise mit einem Fokus im Bereich Wirtschaft, Technik, IT oder Innovation.Relevante Berufserfahrung von mindestens zwei Jahren im Strategie- / Digital-/ E-Commerce-Bereich eines Unternehmens oder in einer etablierten Unternehmensberatung.Fundierte Erfahrung und Begeisterung in mehreren der folgenden Themen: Digitale Geschäftsmodelle, Unternehmensstrategie, Change-Management, Transformationsmanagement, (agile) Organisationsentwicklung, Coaching, Multi-Channel, Customer Experience, Online Marketing, CRM, M-/ E-Commerce, IT-Systeme, IoT, Connected Life.Ausgeprägte analytische Fähigkeiten, strukturiertes Denkvermögen und Ergebnisorientierung als auch Führungspotential oder erste Führungserfahrung, überzeugende Präsentationsfähigkeit und Kommunikationsstärke auf Deutsch und Englisch.

job_title: Consultant/ Management Consulting with French (Group Transformation)
company_name: Societe Generale Global Solution Centre Romania
job_description:
About the job
            
 
ResponsibilitiesWe are seeking to hire a skilled Consultant who will take part in Group transformation projects for clients in an international context. S/he will at the forefront of internal client relations under the supervision of a mission leader and may be given missions in any of the business lines, corporate divisions or subsidiaries of the Group. The role will be in the Transformation Office perimeter, Consulting Team (Consult To TransForm – CTF).Specifically, you will be required to: Take part in consulting missions in related to Group transformation complying with the ethics of internal consulting teams (CTF &SGT) in order to optimize the productivity, profitability, efficiency and competitiveness of the entities of the SG Group to provide better service to end clients;Prepare and lead workshops or meetings using relevant and results oriented techniques;Analyze and provide recommendations by defining appropriate and sustainable targets and develop the current practices and organizations;Contribute to development of the CTF activity by taking part in internal initiatives and projects;Ensure appropriate change management and good relationship with our internal customers;Take part in department activities (training, offers, team meetings, etc) and facilitate knowledge sharing and team spirit within the CTF team and with SG Consulting and Transformation.
Profile Required Consultancy / Audit / Strong Project Management experienceAdvanced level of English and French, both written and spoken (min B2-C1);Advanced skills of MS Office (Excels / Word & PowerPoint);Excellent client interaction skills, collaborative work style, strong interpersonal and team skills;Result oriented, high flexibility and work autonomy;Strong analytical and organizational skills;High ethical standards and integrity.
Why Join UsSG GSC is a Great Place to Work® certified company. Here, you will find a flexible workplace and culture, autonomy, constant learning opportunities, dynamism, and talented people, making this experience a real career accelerator. You will also discover all the diversity of our businesses, in a sector that is constantly evolving and innovating.If you feel like ambitiously pursuing your goals, then you have come to the right place.Plus, you will enjoy all our benefits: competitive compensation & remuneration, including annual performance bonus;preventive healthcare plan, and group health & life insurance;wide range of flexible benefits within a monthly budget;office perks, wellbeing and mental health programs;various social benefits and bonuses for personal or family events;9-to-5 workday & hybrid model; additional paid and unpaid time off, including Sabbatical leave;learning and growth opportunities based on individual development and career plans;unlimited access to various eLearning resources.
Business InsightWe are convinced that people are drivers of change, and that the world of tomorrow will be shaped by all their initiatives, from the smallest to the most ambitious. Whether you’re joining us for a period of months, years or your entire career, together we can have a positive impact on the future. Creating, daring, innovating and taking action are part of our DNA.If you too want to be directly involved, grow in a stimulating and caring environment, feel useful on a daily basis and develop or strengthen your expertise, you will feel right at home with us! Still hesitating? You should know that our employees can dedicate several days per year to solidarity actions during their working hours, including sponsoring people struggling with their orientation or professional integration, participating in the financial education of young apprentices, and sharing their skills with charities. There are many ways to get involved.

About the job
            
 
Werk aan het vernieuwen of verbeteren van processen bij een van onze klanten en zorg voor maximale impact.Jouw rol in ons teamAls Business Consultant ben je onderdeel van een unit die de klant centraal zet en er alles aan doet om ervoor te zorgen dat de klant tevreden is over de verleende diensten. Je werkt aan het vernieuwen of verbeteren van processen bij een van onze klanten. Het totale proces, van offerte tot evaluatie, wordt door het team verzorgd. Je draagt bij aan de digitale transformatie van onze klanten en helpt hen om aan te haken bij de digitale transformatie.Hoe jij ons team versterktWe zoeken een veelzijdige, proactieve en analytische professional met een sterke toewijding aan teamwork en resultaten. De ideale kandidaat heeft de volgende kwalificaties: Een (bijna) afgeronde wo-opleiding op het gebied van bedrijfskunde, bestuurskunde, of business & ITAffiniteit met informatievoorziening, consultancy, of beideDe ambitie om je eigen carrière vorm te gevenZin om aan de slag te gaan met opdrachten voor klanten die ervoor zorgen dat Nederland blijft draaien
Waarom CGI?CGI is één van 's werelds grootste IT-consultancy bedrijven. Onze mensen houden Nederland draaiende. Overheidsinstellingen, banken, lucht- en ruimtevaart, infrastructurele organisaties en energie- en productiebedrijven zijn klanten van CGI.We werken aan interessante projecten die het alledaagse leven van miljoenen mensen raken. We zijn regionaal aanwezig, versterkt met wereldwijde domeinkennis, ons ecosysteem en collega's verspreid over de hele wereld.We zijn trots op de impactvolle projecten die we samen met onze collega’s tot een succes maken.Bij CGI hechten we veel waarde aan diversiteit en inclusie, omdat dit niet alleen de samenwerking bevordert, maar ook vaak leidt tot betere resultaten. We kijken uit naar jouw bijdrage aan ons team!Werken in kleine zelfsturende teams bestaande uit experts in je vakgebied.• De regie over je eigen carrière met daarbij de ruimte om jezelf te blijven ontwikkelen.• Je werkt met de nieuwste technologieën.• Een uitstekend salaris en aantrekkelijke secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden• Direct een vast contract• Parttime mogelijkheden• En de mogelijkheid om CGI aandeelhouder te wordenWaar kom je terecht?Je werkt binnen de Defensie-unit, onderdeel van de sector Defense, Transport & Logistics. Je maakt deel uit van een toegewijd team en hebt de kans om te werken in een uitdagende omgeving. We zijn een partner voor defensieorganisaties in verschillende NATO-landen, waarbij onze activiteiten variëren van cybersecurity, informatiegestuurd optreden, cloud computing, biometrie en secure hosting tot elektronische oorlogsvoering en command & control, evenals ICT-beheer, systeemintegratie en strategische advisering.Sluit je aan bij ons team van experts en solliciteer direct!Solliciteer direct! We nemen dan zo snel mogelijk contact met je op. Vragen over de functie?Stel ze aan Robert van den Berg, Director Consulting Services, via +31 6 2293 2306 of via robert.van.den.berg@cgi.com.Vragen over de sollicitatieprocedure? Neem contact op met Lilija Alesjkevitsj (Recruitment Business Partner) via 06 2558 7597 of via lilija.alesjkevitsj@cgi.com.We werken niet samen met externe recruitment partijen. Acquisitie wordt daarom niet op prijs gesteld.

About the job
            
 
672419BRIntroductionIn this role you will join IBM Consulting via our world class Associate Program for university hires. As an Associate at IBM Consulting you will have the opportunity to work with a diverse range of clients worldwide. Our clients' technical and business needs are constantly evolving. We're hiring inspired, talented individuals, who believe no problem is too big to solve.We focus on your professional development through ongoing learning, mentorship, development of technical skills, and continuous personal growth, all grounded in a culture of coaching and career advancement. If you see yourself as someone who never stops learning and who wants to unleash your potential, the IBM Consulting Associates Program is for you.A career in IBM Consulting embraces long-term relationships and close collaboration with clients across the globe.You'll work with visionaries across multiple industries to improve the hybrid cloud and AI journey for the most innovative and valuable companies in the world. Your ability to accelerate impact and make meaningful change for your clients is enabled by our strategic partner ecosystem and our robust technology platforms across the IBM portfolio; including IBM Software and Red Hat.Curiosity and a constant quest for knowledge serve as the foundation to success in IBM Consulting. In your role, you'll be supported by mentors and coaches who will encourage you to challenge the norm, investigate ideas outside of your role, and come up with creative solutions resulting in ground breaking impact for a wide network of clients. Our culture of evolution and empathy centers on long-term career growth and learning opportunities in an environment that embraces your unique skills and experience.Your Role and ResponsibilitiesResponsibilitiesAs an entry level Strategy Consultant at IBM, you'll be working closely with clients and their customers to understand their pain points, bringing together IBM's unique capabilities across strategy, innovation, design, data analytics, cognitive computing, and technology platforms to develop and deliver high-impact transformation programs. In your role, you may be responsible for: Analyzing and defining a clients cloud strategy based on the business strategyDrawing from primary and existing IBM research on evolving market trendsIdentifying issues, creating hypotheses, and executing analysis, to develop decision-ready recommendations for our clientsAnalyze an existing application portfolio for a cloud journey, identify candidates for a cloud move and build a business caseUnderstand a clients operating model and provide recommendations for adjustments during the cloud journey
Required Technical and Professional Expertise Exceptional quantitative analysis skills and ability to derive recommendations informed by data and insightsPowerful communication and storytelling skills, with an ability to communicate complex situations clearly and simplyAbility to apply logic to solve ambiguous problems and deliver creative and well-structured solutionsA passion for innovative ideas, coupled with the ability to understand and assimilate different points of viewExperience in Cloud , Understanding of Cloud providers, Cloud Operating models Strong interpersonal skills with ability to collaborate and work effectively in an intense team environment, able to build direct working relationships across all levels of the IBM and client teamsFluency in both German and English (written & spoken)
Preferred Technical And Professional Expertise Certification one or more hyperscalers
About Business UnitIBM Consulting is IBM’s consulting and global professional services business, with market leading capabilities in business and technology transformation. With deep expertise in many industries, we offer strategy, experience, technology, and operations services to many of the most innovative and valuable companies in the world. Our people are focused on accelerating our clients’ businesses through the power of collaboration. We believe in the power of technology responsibly used to help people, partners and the planet.Your Life @ IBMIn a world where technology never stands still, we understand that, dedication to our clients success, innovation that matters, and trust and personal responsibility in all our relationships, lives in what we do as IBMers as we strive to be the catalyst that makes the world work better.Being an IBMer means you’ll be able to learn and develop yourself and your career, you’ll be encouraged to be courageous and experiment everyday, all whilst having continuous trust and support in an environment where everyone can thrive whatever their personal or professional background.Our IBMers are growth minded, always staying curious, open to feedback and learning new information and skills to constantly transform themselves and our company. They are trusted to provide on-going feedback to help other IBMers grow, as well as collaborate with colleagues keeping in mind a team focused approach to include different perspectives to drive exceptional outcomes for our customers. The courage our IBMers have to make critical decisions everyday is essential to IBM becoming the catalyst for progress, always embracing challenges with resources they have to hand, a can-do attitude and always striving for an outcome focused approach within everything that they do.Are you ready to be an IBMer?About IBMIBM’s greatest invention is the IBMer. We believe that through the application of intelligence, reason and science, we can improve business, society and the human condition, bringing the power of an open hybrid cloud and AI strategy to life for our clients and partners around the world.Restlessly reinventing since 1911, we are not only one of the largest corporate organizations in the world, we’re also one of the biggest technology and consulting employers, with many of the Fortune 50 companies relying on the IBM Cloud to run their business. At IBM, we pride ourselves on being an early adopter of artificial intelligence, quantum computing and blockchain. Now it’s time for you to join us on our journey to being a responsible technology innovator and a force for good in the world.Location StatementIBM ist es wichtig, Ihnen ein Arbeitsumfeld zu bieten, in dem Sie Ihr ganzes Potenzial voll entfalten können und die Möglichkeit haben, Ihren Arbeitstag flexibel zu gestalten. Wenn Sie Interesse daran haben, sprechen Sie uns bitte an, um herauszufinden, welche Gestaltungsmöglichkeiten im aktuellen Arbeitsumfeld bestehen.Being You @ IBMIBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal-opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, caste, genetics, pregnancy, disability, neurodivergence, age, veteran status, or other characteristics. IBM is also committed to compliance with all fair employment practices regarding citizenship and immigration status.

About the job
            
 
„Wir sind ein innovatives und dynamisches Team, das kundenzentrierte Beratung mit einer Can-Do-Mentalität verbindet.“Wir wollen gemeinsam mit dir zusammen Marketing-Organisationen nachhaltig transformieren.Wie wir das erreichen? Unser Ziel ist es, Unternehmen in den Fokus ihrer Konsument*innen zu rücken und datenbasiertes Wachstum zu generieren. Dafür begleiten wir unsere Kund*innen ganzheitlich: von der Strategiekonzeption bis hin zur erfolgreichen Umsetzung.Was das für uns bedeutet? Wir entwerfen kundenzentrierte Strategien und schaffen mithilfe einer effektiven Technologie- und Datenarchitektur sowie durch Datenanalysen messbaren Erfolg. Aufgrund unserer Erfahrung und Leidenschaft erkennen wir dabei Marketing-Trends frühzeitig und leben genau die Agilität vor, die zur Umsetzung unserer Visionen notwendig ist.Bist du dabei?Hey, bei uns bist du genau richtig! Wir schätzen deine individuelle Perspektive und freuen uns über Bewerbungen unabhängig von Geschlecht, Nationalität, ethnischer und sozialer Herkunft, Religion/Weltanschauung, Behinderung, Alter oder sexueller Orientierung. Bei uns hast du die gleichen Chancen wie alle anderen, denn wir setzen uns aktiv für Vielfalt und Chancengleichheit ein.Dein Profil passt nicht 100%ig auf unsere Stellenausschreibung? – das macht nichts.Wir sind gespannt auf deine Bewerbung!Deine Aufgabe bei uns: ganzheitlich & zukunftsorientiert Du unterstützt aktiv – bei der Umsetzung von Beratungsprojekten im Bereich der digitalen Marketing-Transformation.Du identifizierst Trends – führst eigenverantwortlich quantitative und qualitative (Potential-) Analysen durch, leitest daraus Optimierungsmaßnahmen ab und unterstützt die gewonnen Erkenntnisse in innovative Strategien zu überführen.Du zeigst hohe Lernbereitschaft und Engagement – um deine Fähigkeiten im Bereich der digitalen Marketing-Transformation zu entwickeln und zu vertiefen.Du bringst frische Ideen und innovative Impulse – um aktiv zur ganzheitlichen Weiterentwicklung von bynd beizutragen.
Darum bist du die beste Wahl: Berater*in & Visionär*in Du verfügst über ein erfolgreich abgeschlossenes Diplom- oder Masterstudium.Du hast mindestens ein Jahr Berufserfahrung in der Beratung oder im Bereich Marketing.Du bringst die Fähigkeit zur analytischen und konzeptionellen Denkweise mit, schätzt die Zusammenarbeit im Team und bist in der Lage, komplexe Zusammenhänge schnell zu erfassen.Dein Sprachgefühl und deine zwischenmenschlichen Fähigkeiten sind ausgeprägt, und du besitzt fortgeschrittene Kenntnisse in der Anwendung von PowerPoint und Excel.Du beherrschst Deutsch und Englisch fließend, sowohl mündlich als auch schriftlich.Selbstverständlich – aber zur Sicherheit erwähnt – erwarten wir von einem Consultant ein hohes Maß an Verantwortungsbewusstsein, Belastbarkeit, Serviceorientierung, Teamplayer-Mentalität und einen professionellen Umgang mit Kunden und Partnern.
Darum sind wir die beste Wahl: Entwicklung & SelbstverwirklichungBei bynd [bɪˈjɒnd] möchten wir, dass du gemeinsam mit uns wächst. Deinen Möglichkeiten sind bei uns keine Grenzen gesetzt – sowohl fachlich als auch persönlich.Da wir mit Unternehmen aller Größe und aus unterschiedlichsten Branchen zusammenarbeiten, bieten wir dir eine breite Auswahl an abwechslungsreichen und anspruchsvollen Aufgaben. Bei uns kannst du kontinuierlich neue Erfahrungen sammeln und dich in spannenden Projekten entfalten. Deinen persönlichen Entwicklungspfad gestaltest du dabei in deiner eigenen Geschwindigkeit.Was Wir Dir Dafür Bieten Die Möglichkeit, die strategische Entwicklung von bynd proaktiv mitzugestalten.Kurze Entscheidungswege und eine offene Unternehmenskultur, denn wir arbeiten über alle Positionen hinweg stets auf Augenhöhe.Gelebte Zusammenarbeit durch außergewöhnliche Events, ein großartiges Team und eine „Offene Tür“ Atmosphäre.Mobile-Office Möglichkeit, bei der du bis zu 80% mobil arbeiten kannst.32 Tage Urlaub und flexibler Überstundenausgleich.
BenefitsFortbildungund Seminare Mobiles Arbeiten Feedbackkultur & regelmäßige Befragung Betriebliches Gesundheitsmanagement Direktversicherung FlexiblerÜberstundenausgleich 32 Tage Urlaub Zertifiziertes Energie- und Umweltmanagement Jobrad Sabbatical Mitarbeiter werben Mitarbeiter Prämie Sommerfest Weihnachtsfeier Sportliche Aktivitäten Teilnahme amAgency Cup MitarbeiterrabatteDie Omnicom Media Group Germany ist Teil der Omnicom, einer weltweit führenden Kommunikations-, Werbe- und Marketingdienstleistungsgruppe. Mit den Agenturen OMD, PHD und Hearts & Science umfasst sie drei relevante und wachstumsstarke Mediaagenturnetworks in Deutschland. Im Kerngeschäft betreuen und beraten die Agenturen mehr als 200 namhafte werbungtreibende Unternehmen in den Bereichen Strategie, Kommunikation, Mediaplanung und -einkauf sowie Optimierung und Forschung.Covid-InfoBedingt durch die sich stets wandelnden Bedingungen und Herausforderungen, die Covid-19 mit sich bringt, werden wir das Auswahlverfahren ggf. virtuell durchführen.Weitere Details erhältst du im Verlauf des Bewerbungsprozesses durch deine Ansprechpartner.Frag uns!Du möchtest noch mehr über die bynd wissen? Dann klicke hierDu hast eine Frage? Dann mail doch einfach Nina an:E-Mail

About the job
            
 
Job DescriptionAre you interested in a role as the anchor between the business and the development organisation? Do you enjoy working with both the holistic view as well as the details? Then this might be a role for you!Business Implementation SE is a unit within the Strategy, Transformation & Implementation Asset Finance. Asset Finance SE are focusing on the products leasing and hire purchase for Business Customers. Working in Business Implementation SE has a solid Nordic flavor as all the other countries have similar units and we work cross-Nordics on common projects. We also offer development opportunities in an innovative and international environment.We are a team of three with significant focus on quality work in an atmosphere characterized by teamwork and knowledge sharing. The team contributes in various ways to running Asset Finance SE in a profitable way. We are working as the anchor between the business and the Tribe organisation (development organisation) by providing local and sector solution knowledge to Tribes and having the best customer experience as top of mind. We have a general focus to continue the transformation towards more digital, scalable and sustainable solutions.Teamwork in an ever-changing environmentYour role is to drive and contribute to development, and implementation, of new products, services, processes, and systems within the Asset Finance area.You will be part of creating innovative process and system solutions with a focus on customer experience and our internal efficiency. You will work with varied tasks simultaneously - both driving progress in process optimization within large projects, do detailed testing of new solutions and develop simple IT-tools that will increase efficiency.If you have experience from working in the finance area as well as a Business Analyst and wish to broaden your expertise this could be the opportunity you been waiting for.. We offer you a high level of responsibility, an inspiring team and committed managers who encourage you to grow and develop both personally and professionally.Keeping a holistic approach when handling complex issuesTo do well in this role you need able to handle complex initiatives and have great communication skills in an international environment. As this role entails many parallel assignments and responsibilities, it is important that you excel in structuring complex issues and can set your own priorities. You are analytical, take initiatives and have a holistic perspective when working.We believe that you are creative and curious and that you enjoy learning new things when facing difficult issues without obvious answers. You are excited about sharing your ideas and can influence stakeholders at all levels. You are used to work independently and to reach out to different specialists to solve issues and to build networks.We are looking for someone with: - A relevant University degree- Experience from similar positions for example Business Analyst- Experience working with development and process optimization - Knowledge in Tableau, Power BI or coding experience is a merit as well as strong Excel skills- Strong communication skills in English and Swedish- A background within finance is a plus
We also appreciate your ability to work as part of the global team and encourage the sharing of best practice and harmonization aspirations in the Asset Finance area across the Nordic countries.Curious and want to know more?If you have questions about the position, please contact Head of Business Implementation SE, Erika Berggren on +46 703 91 43 21. We look forward to your application!Send your application no later than December 8th . We will be reviewing candidates on a continuous basis.About UsDanske Bank är en nordisk bank med broar till omvärlden. I 150 år har vi hjälpt människor och företag att frigöra sin potential. En karriär hos oss är en möjlighet att bli en del av en gemenskap med 22 000 kollegor i en kultur som präglas av Team Up, Own It och Be Open. Målet för vår gemensamma resa är att transformera Danske Bank till en bättre bank. För våra kunder, våra medarbetare och samhällena runt omkring oss.

About the job
